english: Each component you need to manufacture is on the right.\nPlacing your mouse over a component's icon shows how to produce it.
translation: 您需要生產的每個組件都在右側。\n將鼠標懸停在組件圖標上，即可顯示該組件的生產方式。

english: Each component you need to manufacture is on the left.\nPlacing your mouse over a component's icon shows how to produce it.
translation: 您需要生產的每個組件都在左側。\n將鼠標懸停在組件圖標上，即可顯示該組件的生產方式。

english: After some careful analysis of the Stargate's blueprints, I have found the backdoor that the late Alexander James Elistar has left you.
translation: 經過對星際之門藍圖的仔細分析，我找到了已故的亞歷山大-詹姆斯-埃利斯塔留給你們的後門。

english: You will use this backdoor to upload a small virus that I have written to their command centre within the HQ. It will disable the station's offensive capabilities and place itself under your command.
translation: 你將利用這個後門，把我編寫的小病毒上傳到總部的指揮中心。它將使空間站失去攻擊能力，並將自己置於你的指揮之下。

english: Captain, I can route a signal to their powergrid and overload their generators, tell me when to trigger it!
translation: 艦長，我可以向他們的電網發送信號，讓他們的發電機過載，告訴我什麼時候觸發！

english: The Andromeda Project has moved their HQ and all key personell into an unknown location in the new sector, where we believe they are controlling the Stargate.
translation: 仙女座計劃已將他們的總部和所有重要人員轉移到新區的一個未知地點，我們相信他們在那裏控制着星際之門。

english: My plan is to use our fleets to take control of the HQ by force. Any and all damage to the HQ should be avoided, many innocent lives are on-board and the loss of life from destroying it would be far too great.\nI have devised a plan with an old friend of yours that should minimise casualties...
translation: 我的計劃是用我們的艦隊武力控制總部。應該避免對總部造成任何破壞，因爲艦上有許多無辜的生命，摧毀總部會造成巨大的人員傷亡。\n，我已經和你的一位老朋友制定了一個計劃，應該可以最大限度地減少人員傷亡......

english: While you neutralise the HQ, my fleet will fight off the Andromeda Project navy. Once the battle is over, I will take control of the HQ and arrest everyone involved. Their conglomerate will be dismantled.
translation: 在你們消滅總部的同時，我的艦隊將擊退仙女座計劃的海軍。一旦戰鬥結束，我將控制總部 並逮捕所有相關人員他們的集團將被摧毀

english: The Stargate will fall back into your sole control. I've marked an allied shipyard on your map. I'll hide out there in the mean-time.
translation: 星際之門將重新歸你控制我在你的地圖上標出了一個盟軍造船廠 I've marked an allied shipyard on your map.這段時間我會躲在那裏 I'll hide out there in the mean time.

english: Meet me to discuss the plan further. Goodbye for now.
translation: 與我會面，進一步討論計劃。再見

english: This is the Andromeda Navy's flagship! You should have access to its command centre from the HQ!
translation: 這是仙女座海軍的旗艦你可以從總部進入指揮中心！

english: Now the Andromeda HQ has been captured, Harken and the Intergalactic Security Council will dismantle the Andromeda Project conglomerate and regain control of the Stargate, for the benefit of all mankind.  A new chapter has begun, as mankind spreads beyond our home galaxy and into the future.
translation: 現在，仙女座總部已被佔領，哈肯和星際安全委員會將爲了全人類的利益，摧毀仙女座計劃集團，重新奪回星際之門的控制權。  新的篇章已經開啓，人類將走出銀河系，走向未來。

english: Hello Captain. The newly completed Stargate has put the Andromeda Project in a powerful position to control the flow of resources and people between this galaxy and the Andromeda galaxy.
translation: 你好，艦長。新建成的星際之門使仙女座計劃處於有利地位，可以控制本星系和仙女座星系之間的資源和人員流動。

english: Hello Captain, it's good to see you. These are all of the ships I control in this sector, the rest are on the other side of the Stargate, unable to reach us.
translation: 你好，艦長，很高興見到你。這些是我在這個區域控制的所有飛船，其餘的都在星際之門的另一端，無法聯繫到我們。

english: Commander Harken! I see that my first fleet has failed to deal with you. I suppose if I want something done properly I should do it myself.
translation: 哈肯指揮官看來我的第一支艦隊沒能對付你我想，如果我想把事情辦好，就應該親自動手。

english: Ship cannot enter hyperspace with your fleet
translation: 艦船無法隨艦隊進入超空間

english: Unlocks schematics for hardware required to maintain a breathable atmosphere
translation: 解鎖維持可呼吸大氣所需的硬件原理圖

english: Unlocks more schematics for hardware required to maintain a breathable atmosphere
translation: 解鎖更多維持可呼吸大氣所需的硬件原理圖

english: Unlocks schematics for hardware to capture and reprocess human waste
translation: 解鎖收集和再處理人類廢物的硬件原理圖

english: When enabled, the Docking Assistant will perform the final maneuovers required to dock your ship with another, once you are close enough.\n\nIt is recommended you disable Fleet Formation when attempting to dock.
translation: 啓用該功能後，一旦您的飛船與另一艘飛船靠得足夠近，對接助手就會執行對接所需的最後機動操作。\n\n建議您在嘗試對接時禁用艦隊編隊功能。

english: When enabled, all of the fleet ships within a system will fly together in close formation, following the lead of whichever ship you are directly controlling.
translation: 啓用該功能後，系統內的所有艦隊飛船都將以緊密編隊的方式飛行，跟隨您直接控制的飛船前進。

english: When enabled, your other fleet ships will take care of themselves during combat, moving to optimal range and engaging as best they can.
translation: 啓用後，其他艦隊戰艦會在戰鬥中照顧好自己，移動到最佳射程並盡最大可能進行交戰。

english: [LMB] Select weapon\n[SHIFT-LMB] Select multiple weapons\n[RMB] Clear current target
translation: [左鍵] 選擇武器\n[SHIFT-左鍵] 選擇多個武器\n[右鍵] 清除當前目標
自動瞄準\n[左鍵] 啓用自動瞄準\n[右鍵] 禁用自動瞄準

english: L*X does not have a working R*Y
L*X does not have any R*Ys
System S*X does not have any R*Y to mine
translation: 星系 S*X 沒有任何 R*Y 可供開採

english: System S*X does not have any R*Y to collect
translation: 星系 S*X 沒有任何 R*Y 可供收集

english: System S*X does not have a trading post
translation: 星系 S*X 沒有貿易站

english: L*X does not have any R*Y to sell
translation: L*X 沒有任何 R*Y 可供出售

english: Stargate is not ready for jump
translation: 星際之門尚未做好跳躍準備
正在將 *X R*Y 轉運至 L*Z
正在從 L*Z 轉運 *X R*Y

english: First, select a friendly ship with a laser infuser available.
translation: 首先，選擇一艘裝有激光注入器的友方飛船。

english: Connect a tank to the Hyperspace Scoop
translation: 將儲罐連接到超空間收集器

english: Connect a Loader to the tank
Captain, preparations have concluded for the final Stargate test. We are ready to send a ship to the Andromeda Galaxy. Please call us when you are ready.
translation: 艦長，最後一次星際之門測試的準備工作已經結束。我們準備好向仙女座星系派遣飛船了。準備好後請通知我們。

english: The materials you provided to us have been fitted to the Stargate. It is fully functional and ready to test.
translation: 您提供的材料已經安裝到星際之門上。它功能齊全，可以進行測試。

english: This is a monumental moment in the history of our species. If this test is successful the Andromeda Project will be the first entity to send mankind to another galaxy.
translation: 這是我們人類歷史上的重要時刻。如果試驗成功，仙女座計劃將成爲第一個把人類送往另一個星系的組織。

english: Captain, you will need to begin the test and provide power for the entire journey so our test ship can reach the Andromeda Galaxy. This will require a significant amount of energy, more than what's needed to travel between sectors.
translation: 艦長，你需要開始測試，併爲整個旅程提供動力，這樣我們的測試飛船才能到達仙女座星系。這將需要大量的能量，比星區旅行所需的能量還要多。

english: Please begin the test when you are ready.
translation: 請在準備就緒後開始測試。

english: Send the test ship to the Andromeda Galaxy
translation: 將試驗飛船送往仙女座星系
從試驗船接收到的信號

english: Payment for sending the test ship
Captain, the Stargate has received a signal from the Andromeda Galaxy.
translation: 艦長，星際之門收到了來自仙女座星系的信號。

english: The test ship made it. The test was a complete and total success. This is a historic moment for all of mankind.
translation: 試驗飛船成功了。試驗取得了圓滿成功。這是全人類的歷史性時刻。

english: It couldn't have been done without you Captain. Your industrial expertise and dedication to the project have been invaluable.
translation: 沒有你，艦長，就不可能完成任務。你的工業專業知識和對項目的奉獻精神非常寶貴。

english: Thank you Captain, your contribution will not be forgotten. Goodbye for now.
translation: 謝謝艦長，我們不會忘記您的貢獻。再見。

english: Captain, there are reports that the Andromeda Project are withholding access to the Stargate from any ships that aren't their own.
translation: 艦長，有報告說仙女座計劃拒絕任何非他們自己的飛船進入星際之門。

english: My sensors are detecting major fleet movements towards the Stargate, it looks like the Andromeda Project is aiming to secure their control over it.
translation: 我的傳感器探測到艦隊正向星際之門移動，看來仙女座計劃的目標是確保他們對星際之門的控制。

english: This is... concerning. Be careful, I don't like the look of this.
translation: 這......令人擔憂。小心點，我不喜歡這個樣子。

english: The next stage of the project has begun. Our fleet has obtained full control over the Stargate and we are currently in the process of moving our workforce into the new galaxy.
translation: 項目的下一階段已經開始。我們的艦隊已經獲得了對星際之門的完全控制權，目前正在將我們的勞動力轉移到新的星系。

english: We will bring prosperity to all those who work with us. Speak to you soon, Captain. We may have some more work for you in the future.
translation: 我們將爲所有與我們合作的人帶來繁榮。回頭見，艦長。我們將來可能會有更多的工作給你。
仙女座號試驗飛船 MK.1

english: Captain! In direct violation of intergalactic law, the Andromeda Project has permanently closed access to the Stargate outside of their own ships. Billions of colonists have been stranded in the new sector, unable to return home.
translation: 艦長仙女座計劃直接違反了星際法 永久關閉了星際之門的入口 除了他們自己的飛船之外數以億計的殖民者被困在新的區域 無法回家

english: You are the only one outside of the Andromeda Project with access codes, please call back as soon as you can. They must be stopped.
translation: 你是仙女座計劃外唯一有密碼的人 請儘快回電必須阻止他們

english: Greetings Captain, I was worried you had taken their side in all of this.
translation: 你好，艦長，我還擔心你會站在他們那邊呢。

english: My officers have pin-pointed the position of their HQ. Upon arrival we expect to be met with heavy resistance from their private security forces.
translation: 我的軍官已經確定了他們總部的位置。我們抵達後，預計會遭到他們私人保安部隊的猛烈抵抗。

english: I should be able to grab their attention away from your fleet while you get close and take control of the station.
translation: 我應該能把他們的注意力從你的艦隊上吸引過來，而你則靠近並控制空間站。

english: Good luck Captain, I'll see you on the battlefield.
translation: 祝你好運，艦長，我們戰場上見。

english: Take control of the Andromeda Project HQ
I gave you a very clear warning, Captain. You could've had anything in the universe as our business partner.
translation: 我給過你很明確的警告，艦長。作爲我們的商業夥伴，你可以擁有宇宙中的任何東西。

english: It was a pleasure working with you.
This is DOGMA Private Security force, we are en-route to the disturbance. ETA: imminent.
translation: 這裏是DOGMA私人安保部隊，我們正在趕往騷亂現場。預計到達時間：即刻。

english: There are multiple hostile signatures inbound on our position! You must get in close range of the HQ and upload the virus. I'll do my best to keep their ships off you.
translation: 有多個敵對信號正在接近我們的位置！你必須接近總部並上傳病毒。我會盡力不讓他們的飛船靠近你們。

english: Great work Captain! But my sensors are detecting a massive signature headi-
translation: 幹得好，艦長！但我的傳感器探測到一個巨大的信號正朝——

english: I've lost both of my frigates Captain! I don't have enough firepower to win this!
translation: 我失去了兩艘護衛艦，艦長！我沒有足夠的火力取勝！

english: DANGER: POWER SYSTEMS DETERIORATING. POWER GRID OVERLOADED.
translation: 危險：電力系統惡化。電網超負荷。

english: I don't understand, how is that possible!?
Send all available power to railguns, set target to-
translation: 將所有可用能量輸送到軌道炮，設定目標——

english: This is a message for Andromeda HQ. I am Commander Harken, Chief of Private Security for this sector, and I command you to stand down.
translation: 這是給仙女座總部的信息。我是哈肯指揮官，本星區的私人安保主管。我命令你們退下。

english: The Andromeda Navy in this sector has been destroyed, you are now blockaded, there is nothing left to fight for.
translation: 這個星區的仙女座海軍已經被摧毀了，你們現在被封鎖了，沒有什麼可以爲之戰鬥的了。

english: It's over, Captain. The Andromeda HQ will be placed under the jurisdiction of the Intergalactic Security Council while I make the necessary arrests. The access codes for the Stargate are back under your control.
translation: 結束了，艦長。仙女座總部將被置於星際安全委員會的管轄之下，同時我將進行必要的逮捕。星際之門的訪問代碼已重新由你控制。

english: The current leadership of the Andromeda Project will be dismantled and the new galaxy will be freed from their control.
translation: 仙女座計劃目前的領導層將被解散，新星系將擺脫他們的控制。

english: You've proven that you can be trusted with control of the Stargate, so I'll leave it in your hands.
translation: 你已經證明了你是值得信賴的星際之門控制者，所以我把它交給你了。

english: Goodbye Captain, and good luck with your new place in the galaxy.
translation: 再見，艦長，祝你在銀河系的新徵程一切順利。

english: Laser infusers are used to charge empty crystals with zeleon gas and will emit radiation to the surrounding area while powered.\n\nInstall the laser infuser in a clear area and power it.
translation: 激光注入器用於將Zeleon氣體充入空晶體，通電時會向周圍區域釋放輻射。\n\n將激光注入器安裝在一個空曠的區域併爲其通電。

english: Let's set the laser infuser to use them to produce charged crystals.
translation: 讓我們設置激光注入器，用它們來生產充能水晶。

english: The laser infuser is set to start making charged crystals! Laser infusers use Zeleon Energy Cells to charge the crystals.\n\nLet's wait for it to begin charging crystals.
translation: 激光注入器已設定開始製造充能水晶！激光注入器使用Zeleon能量電池爲晶體充電。\n\n讓我們等待它開始爲晶體充電。

english:
Sector scans search for areas of interest in the sector around the system your ship is located in.

The scan will stop after it has completed. Only one ship in a system can do a sector scan.

Click the button to begin a sector scan.
translation:
星區掃描會在您飛船所在星系周圍的星區中搜索興趣點。

掃描完成後將停止。一個星系中只能有一艘飛船進行星區掃描。

點擊按鈕開始星區掃描。

english: Areas of interest will expire after some time if they are not surveyed. Multiple ships can contribute towards a local survey.\n\nClick on the point of interest to begin the local survey.
translation: 如果不進行勘測，興趣點將在一段時間後失效。多艘飛船可以共同進行本地勘測。\n\n點擊興趣點開始本地勘測。

english: Please don't let that happen Captain. So much of my life and so many of my projects have been done purely for profit, I can't let this become one of them. As a safeguard against the Andromeda Project, I have installed a back-door that allows you to take control of the Stargate and any devices commanding it.
translation: 請不要讓這種事發生，艦長。我的一生和許多項目都是純粹爲了利益而做的，我不能讓這個項目也變成那樣。爲了防備仙女座計劃，我安裝了一個後門，可以讓你控制星際之門和任何指揮它的裝置。

english: Please use it if they restrict the use of the Stargate for their own gain.
translation: 如果他們爲了自己的利益而限制使用星際之門，請使用它。

english: I need materials to synthesise the resources we need.  You can help me with this, while I work on the calculations. I'll need Hyperspace Isotopes - you should be able to collect them easily enough, but you'll need to acquire a Hyperspace Scoop and a tank to store the isotopes in first.
translation: 我需要材料來合成我們需要的資源。在我進行計算的時候，您可以幫我這個忙。我需要超空間同位素——您應該很容易就能收集到，但您需要先獲得一個超空間收集器和一個儲存同位素的儲罐。

english: The game will be saved to Steam Cloud when enabled. A warning will show if the save fails.
translation: 啓用後，遊戲存檔將上傳至 Steam 雲。如果保存失敗，將會顯示警告。

english: We cannot deliver those passengers to their destination without Faster-Than-Light travel. Unfortunately this ship is not equipped with its own FTL drive.\n\nWe'll need to buy one and set it up.
translation: 沒有超光速旅行，我們無法將這些乘客送達目的地。不幸的是，這艘飛船沒有配備自己的超光速驅動器。\n\n我們需要買一個並安裝好。

english: Open the trade screen to purchase an FTL drive and some FTL charges.
translation: 打開貿易界面，購買一個超光速驅動器和一些超光速燃料。

english: Their exterior wear leads us to believe that they have been here for at least a century. This sector must have been one of mankind's first attempts to colonise outer-space.
translation: 它們外表的磨損讓我們相信，它們在這裏至少已經存在一個世紀了。這個星區肯定是人類最早殖民外太空的嘗試之一。

english: Spend research credits to continually increase our smelting efficiency.
translation: 花費研究點數，不斷提高我們的冶煉效率。

english: Create epic space battles between fleets of ships and watch the carnage unfold.
translation: 在艦隊之間創建史詩般的太空戰役，見證毀滅的降臨。

english: Create epic space battles between fleets of ships and watch the carnage unfold.
translation: 在艦隊之間創建史詩般的太空戰役，見證毀滅的降臨。
離開超光速時自動保存

english: Hostile ships will only target you once you have targeted them first.
translation: 只有當你首先瞄準敵艦時，敵艦纔會瞄準你。

english: Enables multi-system simulation, allowing you to split up your fleet among multiple systems/sectors simultaneously.
translation: 啓用多星系模擬，允許您的艦隊同時分佈在多個星系/星區中。
警告 - 勘測將被取消

english: Toggle painting the exterior panels of the hull of your ship
translation: 切換船體外部面板的噴漆工作

english: Toggle painting the exterior panels of the habitation quarters of your ship
translation: 對飛船居住區的外牆板進行切換噴漆

english: Toggle painting the scaffolding on your ship
translation: 爲船上的腳手架噴塗油漆

english: Toggle painting the floor tiles of your ship
translation: 對飛船的地磚進行切換噴漆

english: Toggle painting the base colour of the walls of your ship
translation: 切換繪製飛船牆壁的基色

english: Change the colour of decals applied to the walls of your ship
Apply or remove decals on the walls of your ship
translation: 在船壁上粘貼或去除貼花
加速研究（成本：1 研究點數）

english: Perform sector scans to find derelict ships that contain research credits.
translation: 執行星區掃描，尋找含有研究點數的廢棄船隻。

english: Load into a Science Station for analysis
Simulations predict that the new charged crystals allow the Stargate to jump ships to different galaxies. The Stargate's computer systems need to be upgraded to handle this.
translation: 模擬預測，新的充能水晶可以讓星際之門的飛船跳躍到不同的星系。星際之門的計算機系統需要升級才能處理這個問題。

english: Unlock surveying the current sector for new systems nearby.
translation: 解鎖勘察當前星區以尋找附近的新星系。

english: Unlocks the ability to convert tracks into splitters, and vice versa. Splitters will evenly distribute items between their output directions.
translation: 解鎖將軌道轉換爲分割器的功能，反之亦然。分軌器會在輸出方向之間平均分配物品。

english: Spend research credits to continually improve the efficiency of our reactors.
translation: 花費研究點數，不斷提高反應堆的效率。

english: Spend research credits to continually increase the speed of our drones.
translation: 花費研究點數，不斷提高無人機的速度。

english: Spend research credits to continually increase our robot arm speed.
translation: 花費研究點數，不斷提高機械臂的速度。

english: Laser infuser, infuses objects with energy. No tiddlets were harmed in the making of this equipment.
translation: 激光注入器，爲物體注入能量。製造此設備未傷害任何 Tiddlets。

english: These are installed in the exterior wall of your ship, reducing the damaging effects of lightning and providing more control over where the lightning strikes. They cannot be repaired, but they will queue the installation of their replacement, when destroyed by lightning.
translation: 安裝在飛船外壁，可減少閃電造成的傷害，並引導雷擊位置。它們無法修復，但在被閃電擊毀後會自動生成替換安裝任務。

english: This processor chip contains information that can be used to boost our current research or improve the efficiency of our equipment.
translation: 該處理器芯片包含的信息可用於促進我們當前的研究或提高我們設備的效率。

english: Your ship has been struck by lightning, temporarily disabling some of your equipment.
translation: 您的飛船被閃電擊中，部分設備暫時癱瘓。

english: We are going to learn about radiation.
translation: 我們將學習關於輻射的知識。

english:
The game has been set to a slower speed for now.

Radiation is emitted in all directions away from the laser infuser.

Click on the radiation overlay to view where your ship is irradiated.
translation:
遊戲速度已暫時調慢。

輻射會從激光注入器向四面八方擴散。

點擊輻射視圖，查看飛船受輻射的區域。

english: All green areas of your ship are safe for your crew, but the darker areas are dangerous.\n\nSpacesuits will protect your crew from being irradiated.
translation: 飛船上的所有綠色區域對船員來說都是安全的，但較暗的區域則很危險。\n\n太空服可以保護船員免受輻射。

english:
Radiation spread can be limited by special equipment called radiation blockers.

Install some blockers close to your laser infuser, leaving a small gap between the infuser and the blocker.

Increase the game speed when you are ready.
translation:
輻射擴散可以通過一種叫做輻射阻擋器的特殊設備來限制。

在激光注入器附近安裝一些阻擋器，在注入器和阻擋器之間留出一小塊空隙。

準備好後，提高遊戲速度。

english: A radiation blocker will lower the radiation travelling through it, this can be seen on the radiation overlay.
translation: 輻射阻擋器會降低穿過它的輻射，這可以在輻射視圖上看到。

english: Your crew will become sick if exposed to unsafe radiation for too long, which may eventually result in death.
translation: 如果長時間暴露在不安全的輻射下，您的船員會生病，最終可能導致死亡。

english: Well done, you have now learnt how radiation works and how to manage radiation levels in your ship.
translation: 幹得好，您現在已經瞭解了輻射的原理以及如何管理飛船內的輻射水平。

english: We are going to learn how to survey the area around your ship. The first step is to scan the local area of the sector surrounding you ship using a SECTOR SCAN. In Boldly Go, only the new sector can be surveyed. Hyperspace sensors are required to do this.
translation: 我們將學習如何勘測飛船周圍的區域。 第一步是使用星區掃描對飛船周圍的星區進行局部掃描。 在“勇往直前”模式中，只能勘測新星區。 這需要使用超空間傳感器。

english:
Install Hyperspace Sensors or Hyperspace Sensor LRs onto one of your ships.

This tutorial will resume afterwards.

If you are playing the Boldly Go game mode, your ship must also be in the new sector.
translation:
將超空間傳感器或超空間傳感器 LR 安裝到您的一艘飛船上。

之後，本教程將繼續進行。

如果您玩的是“勇往直前”遊戲模式，您的飛船也必須位於新星區。

english: Hovering the mouse over the current system will reveal the radius around the system that is being scanned and the scan's progress toward finding new points of interest.\n\nOpen the SECTOR MAP and click NEXT to speed-up the survey.
translation: 將鼠標懸停在當前星系上，會顯示正在掃描的星系周圍半徑，以及掃描發現新興趣點的進度。\n\n打開星區地圖，點擊下一步可加快勘測速度。

english: The next step is to perform a LOCAL SURVEY. Local surveys allow points of interest to be accessed via FTL. Ships need to have super computers installed and must be in the same sector to participate in a local survey.
translation: 下一步是進行本地勘測。 本地勘測允許通過超光速訪問興趣點。 飛船需要安裝超級計算機，並且必須在同一星區才能參與本地勘測。

english: Install a super-computer on one of your ships.\n\nThis tutorial will resume afterwards.
translation: 在您的一艘飛船上安裝一臺超級計算機。\n\n之後將繼續本教程。
點擊下一步加快勘測速度。

english:
A new system on the sector map has appeared for your fleet to explore!

Well done, you have now learnt how to use sector surveying to find and explore new systems.

Keep an eye out for special loot on surveyed derelict ships that can be researched by your science stations.
translation:
星區地圖上出現了一個新星系，供您的艦隊探索！

幹得好，您現在已經學會了如何使用星區勘測來尋找和探索新星系。

留意已勘測的廢棄飛船上的特殊戰利品，您的科學站可以對其進行研究。

english: I can't believe it, the Stargate worked! This is my greatest project, my greatest achievement, perhaps my final one too. Maybe I'll have the chance to see the new sector for myself one day.
translation: 真不敢相信，星際之門成功了！這是我最偉大的工程，最偉大的成就，也許也是我最後的成就。也許有一天，我會有機會親眼目睹新的星區。

english: I believe this is only the beginning though, the Andromeda Project have made it clear they want to reach a new galaxy, not just a new sector. I'm sure they will be in contact soon about the next steps of the Stargate.
translation: 我相信這僅僅是個開始，仙女座計劃已經明確表示，他們希望到達的是一個新的星系，而不僅僅是一個新的區域。我相信他們很快就會就星際之門的下一步計劃與我們聯繫。

english: Thank you Captain, for all your hard work. Goodbye for now.
translation: 感謝艦長的辛勤工作。再見。

english: Uncover the history of the new sector.
Hello again Captain, the Andromeda Project is very impressed with the samples you've sent them. They want your work on the Stargate to continue.
translation: 又見面了，艦長。仙女座計劃對你送來的樣本印象深刻。他們希望你在星際之門的工作能繼續下去。

english: I must warn you, there are rumours that their plan is to take the Stargate fully under their control. They will charge anyone who wants to use it a fortune, preventing any competition and harvesting all the resources in the new galaxy for themselves. They will become more powerful than any entity we have seen before.
translation: 我必須警告你，有傳言說他們的計劃是要完全控制星際之門。他們會向任何想使用星際之門的人收取鉅額費用，阻止任何競爭，並將新星系的所有資源據爲己有。他們將變得比我們以前見過的任何組織都要強大。

english: Unfortunately, I've been given some bad news, and I won't be around for much longer. I would like to give you full ownership of the foundry as a thank you for helping me finish this final project.
translation: 不幸的是，我得到了一些壞消息，我不會在這裏待太久了。我想把鑄造廠的全部所有權交給你，以感謝你幫助我完成這個最後的項目。

english: It seems we have completed it just in time.
translation: 看來我們完成得正是時候。

english: This is our final call, Captain. I wish you the best of luck. Thank you again, and goodbye.
translation: 這是我們最後一次通話，艦長。祝你好運。再次感謝，再見。

english: Captain, our sector scan has found new systems. They contain shipyards that are currently being operated by pirates.
translation: 艦長，我們的區域掃描發現了新的星系。這些星系中的造船廠目前由海盜經營。

english: There are signs of a massive galactic war in this sector, with derelict ship signals appearing all across our sector map.
translation: 有跡象表明，這個星區正在進行一場大規模的銀河戰爭，整個星區地圖上都出現了廢棄飛船的信號。

english: The aftermath of the war resulted in pirates gaining control of the sector for themselves. They have since been living here, dormant, surviving from the resources harvested in local asteroid belts and nebulas.
translation: 戰爭結束後，海盜們獲得了對該星區的控制權。從那時起，他們就蟄伏在這裏，靠從當地小行星帶和星雲中獲取的資源生存。

english: Destroying the fortresses would allow us to set up friendly shipyards and take back control of the sector from the pirates.
translation: 摧毀要塞後，我們就可以建立友好的造船廠，從海盜手中奪回該地區的控制權。

english: Be prepared to be met with heavy resistance if you choose to visit them. I have added their positions to your sector map.
translation: 如果您選擇去拜訪他們，請做好遭遇猛烈抵抗的準備。我已將他們的位置添加到您的區域地圖中。

english: There's a shuttle on the way to L*X with surveying equipment on-board. It will allow you to scan the area around your ship.
translation: 在前往L*X 的途中有一艘穿梭機，機上裝有測量設備。它可以讓你掃描飛船周圍的區域。

english: There's a shuttle on the way to L*X with surveying equipment on-board. The equipment can only be used in the new sector, so you'll need to send a ship through the Stargate to start surveying.
translation: 在前往L*X 的途中有一艘飛船，上面裝有勘測設備。這些設備只能在新區域使用，所以你需要派一艘飛船通過星際之門開始勘測。

english: The forgotten battlefields of the sector may contain new research opportunities, I'd recommend that you explore any derelict ships you detect.
translation: 該區被遺忘的戰場可能蘊藏着新的研究機會，我建議您探索您發現的任何廢棄船隻。

english: That's all from me Captain, good luck.
translation: 我就說這麼多，艦長，祝你好運。
接收 LR 超空間傳感器 [*X/*Y]

english: Assist the scientist with his research.
Hello again, Captain. Congratulations on completing the latest phase of the Stargate project! We are all very impressed by your commitment and dedication.
translation: 您好，艦長。祝賀你完成了星際之門計劃的最新階段！你的承諾和奉獻精神給我們留下了深刻的印象。

english: The project has a new task for you. One of our scientists is investigating a new lifeform called tiddlets.
translation: 項目有一項新任務交給你。我們的一位科學家正在研究一種新的生命形式，叫做 "Tiddlets"。

english: Upon death, a crystal is formed at the core of the tiddlet. This crystal has extraordinary energy density, which is exactly what we need to increase the hyperspace range of the Stargate.
translation: 死亡後，會在Tiddlet的核心形成一個晶體。這種晶體具有超強的能量密度，而這正是我們增加星際之門超空間範圍所需要的。

english: The Andromeda Project would love to relentlessly farm these tiddlets, but due to recent accidents they have become a strictly protected species. The scientist you're going to visit is researching how to ethically produce their crystals. He believes the new sector's resources will be a breakthrough for his research.
translation: 仙女座計劃很想無情地養殖這些Tiddlets，但由於最近發生的事故，它們成了受嚴格保護的物種。你們要拜訪的科學家正在研究如何以道德的方式生產它們的晶體。他相信新區域的資源將是他研究的一個突破口。

english: Visit him and provide him a sample of the zeleon.
translation: 拜訪他，並向他提供一份Zeleon樣品。

english: Deliver a sample of Shielded Zeleon [*X/*Y]
Deliver a sample of Neubidium Ingots [*X/*Y]
Captain? Is that you? What are you doing here? It's so good to see you!
translation: 艦長？是你嗎？你怎麼來了？見到你太好了！

english: The Andromeda Project have hired me to work on synthesising the tiddlet crystals that we discovered during our research, and I see they've sent you to provide me with the zeleon.
translation: 仙女座計劃僱我來合成我們在研究過程中發現的Tiddlet晶體，我看到他們派你來給我提供Zeleon。

english: I see you're looking after those tiddlets well! A lot has changed since the tiddlet farm explosion. They are a protected species now and harming them is strictly prohibited.
translation: 我看你把那些Tiddlets照顧得很好！自從Tiddlet農場爆炸以來，已經發生了很多變化。它們現在是受保護物種，嚴禁傷害它們。

english: A lot has changed since the tiddlet farm explosion. They are a protected species now and harming them is strictly prohibited.
translation: 自從Tiddlet農場爆炸以來，很多事情都發生了變化。它們現在是受保護物種，嚴禁傷害它們。

english: Greetings Captain, the Andromeda Project have hired me to work on synthesising crystals produced by a creature I discovered. I've named them tiddlets.
translation: 你好，艦長。仙女座計劃僱我來合成我發現的一種生物所產生的晶體。我給它們起名叫 "Tiddlets"。

english: Upon death, a crystal is formed at the core of the tiddlet. My job is to find a way to produce these crystals without having to farm any tiddlets in the process.
translation: 一旦死亡，就會在Tiddlet的核心處形成晶體。我的任務就是想辦法生產這些晶體，而不需要在生產過程中養殖任何Tiddlets。

english: The neubidium and zeleon you discovered could be key to my research.
translation: 你發現的Neubidium和Zeleon可能是我研究的關鍵。

english: One moment Captain, I've sent a shuttle to receive the resources from you.
translation: 請稍等，艦長，我已經派了一艘穿梭機去接收你的資源。

english: Unfortunately, it looks like you don't have the resources I need for my experiment, when you have the required amount come back and I'll retrieve them from you.
translation: 不幸的是，你好像沒有我的實驗所需的資源，等你有了所需的資源再回來，我會從你那裏取回的。

english: Great! That should be all the resources I need. I'll run the experiments and call you back when I'm done.
translation: 太好了！這應該就是我需要的所有資源了。我會進行實驗，完成後給你回電話。

english: Thank you for doing that Captain, Artemis will correspond with you directly from now on.
translation: 謝謝你這樣做，艦長，從現在起阿耳特彌斯將直接與你通信。

english: Wait for Artemis to call you about his experiment
translation: 等待阿耳特彌斯給你打電話詢問他的實驗情況

english: Hello Captain! I have incredible results. Using a highly powered zeleon laser we can charge synthetic crystals made of Neubidium to achieve properties similar to that of the tiddlet crystals.
translation: 你好，艦長！我有令人難以置信的成果使用高能zeleon激光器，我們可以給新銣原子合成晶體充電，使其具有與提德雷晶體類似的特性。

english: This is a fantastic breakthrough but I must warn you that the laser is incredibly radioactive, and will very quickly kill your crew if you don't correctly contain its radiation.
translation: 這是一項了不起的突破，但我必須警告你，這種激光具有驚人的輻射性，如果不正確控制其輻射，你的船員很快就會喪命。

english: Come back to my system and I'll send you one of my lasers along with some radiation blockers to keep your crew safe.
translation: 回到我的系統，我會給你送去我的激光器和一些輻射阻斷器，以保證你的船員安全。
從阿爾忒彌斯接收新設備
接收 Zeleon 能源電池

english: The next step is to research how this all applies to the Stargate. My hypothesis is that we can use the crystal's energy-density properties to enable jumps much farther than the next sector.
translation: 下一步是研究這一切如何應用於星際之門。我的假設是，我們可以利用水晶的能量密度特性，實現比下一個星區更遠的跳躍。

english: Good luck with your research, Captain.
Resets your modified translation back to the original translation.
translation: 將修改後的譯文重置爲原始譯文。

english: Opens the folder in which your modified translations are saved.\n\n"language.csv" is the file containing your modified translations.
translation: 打開保存已修改翻譯的文件夾。\n\n"language.csv" 是包含已修改翻譯的文件。

english: This is what you are translating.
translation: 這就是你要翻譯的內容。

english: You cannot change the English phrases.
This is what is currently used in the game.
translation: 這就是目前遊戲中使用的方法。

english: This is where you can change the translation.\n\nThis will affect your game only, unless you submit your updated translations to Introversion.
translation: \n\n這隻會影響您的遊戲，除非您將更新後的翻譯提交給 Introversion。
造船廠\n約翰尼-斯特勞斯

english: Thanks to everyone\nwho contributed ship designs
translation: 感謝大家\n投稿的飛船設計

english: This will be the final journey of your fleet.\nBe prepared for a long journey to the Andromeda galaxy, and save as many as you can!
translation: 這將是你們艦隊的最後一次旅行。\n做好前往仙女座星系的長途旅行準備，儘可能多地拯救更多的人！

english: We hope you enjoyed playing the demo of The Last Starship. Your journey has just begun!  Unlock the full game to explore more Story Episodes, Survival Mode, Arena Mode, a full Ship Editor and more!
translation: 希望您喜歡《最後的星艦》試玩版。您的旅程纔剛剛開始！  解鎖完整版遊戲，探索更多故事情節、生存模式、競技場模式、完整的飛船編輯器等！

english: After a long and perilous journey, the survivors emerged into a new and uncharted galaxy.  Those left behind faced a desperate, nomadic life.  But those that made the jump face an even more uncertain future.  Humanity's survival remains on a knife edge...
translation: 經過漫長而危險的旅程，倖存者來到了一個未知的新星系。  留下的人面臨着絕望的遊牧生活。  而那些成功跳躍的人則面臨着更加不確定的未來。  人類的生存仍然岌岌可危......

english: Enable features to help translators, such as Alt to reveal English and Ctrl to reveal the phrase key. Enables the translation editing window ({TranslatorWindow}).
translation: 啓用輔助翻譯功能，例如按 Alt 顯示英文原文，按 Ctrl 顯示短語鍵名。啓用翻譯編輯窗口 ({TranslatorWindow})。

english: Lets you select a paint from the exterior of your ship (can also be used by pressing the "{AltTool}" key)
translation: 讓您從飛船外部選擇一種塗料（也可通過按"{AltTool}"鍵使用）

english: When enabled, the current game will create an auto-save when abandoned or when the game is quit.
translation: 啓用後，放棄或退出遊戲時將自動保存當前進度。

english: Captain, the new sector needs to be surveyed before your sector map is populated with systems. We have a full scan underway for the sector, once it's completed more locations will be marked on your map.
translation: 艦長，在您的航區地圖填入系統之前，需要對新航區進行勘測。我們正在對該區域進行全面掃描，掃描完成後，您的地圖上將標註更多地點。

english: In the systems surveyed so far we've found new resources and severe weather systems, which may be just a glimpse into what awaits us in this sector.
translation: 在迄今爲止調查過的系統中，我們發現了新的資源和惡劣天氣系統，這可能只是這個領域等待我們的一瞥。

english: Who knows what you may find out here. Be careful, Captain.
translation: 誰知道你會在這裏發現什麼小心點，艦長

english: It's not too complex.  It starts with a Hyperspace Scoop, or several ideally, that you can fit to your vessels.  Every time you make an FTL jump you'll collect more as you pass through hyperspace.  You can then pipe those isotopes into a Refinery and convert them into Stable Isotopes.
translation: 這並不複雜。  一開始你可以在飛船上安裝一個或幾個超空間收集器。  每次進行超光速跳躍時，您都會在通過超空間時收集到更多的同位素。  然後，您可以將這些同位素輸送到精煉廠，將其轉化爲穩定同位素。

english: Spend research credits to continually increase our crop yield.
translation: 花費研究點數，不斷提高作物產量。

english: This save is likely to be overwritten by the game as you continue playing, so you should create a manual save if you haven't already done so using the "SAVE GAME" option.\n\nThis warning can be disabled in the settings menu.
translation: 繼續遊戲時，該保存數據可能會被遊戲覆蓋，因此如果還沒有使用 "保存遊戲 "選項，則應手動創建一個保存數據。\n\n該警告可在設置菜單中禁用。

english: Emits radiation. For testing new radiation mechanic (has no gameplay use).
translation: 發射輻射。用於測試新的輻射機制（無遊戲用途）。

english: Radiation blocker, significantly reduces all radiation passing through it. Place between your crew and equipment that emit radiation.
translation: 輻射阻擋器，可大大減少通過它的所有輻射。放置在工作人員和輻射設備之間。

english: BATTLE STATIONS must be activated before your weapons can be used.\n\nThis will tell your crew to prepare for battle!
translation: 戰鬥崗位 必須在您使用武器之前啓動。\n\n這將告訴您的船員做好戰鬥準備！

english: The Stargate enables travel between different sectors.\n\nThe jump costs a single FTL charge and the Stargate will use more power while a jump is in progress.
translation: 星際之門可以在不同的星區之間旅行。\n\n跳躍需要消耗一次超光速燃料，跳躍過程中星際之門會消耗更多能量。
首先，讓我們打開超光速窗口。

english: The REACTOR is activated! We are now generating power for our ship.
translation: 反應堆已啓動！現在我們正在爲飛船發電。

english: Let's turn our attention to the STARGATE PROJECT. We can view our progress from the Stargate screen. Open the STARGATE screen.
translation: 現在我們將注意力轉向星際之門項目。 我們可以從星際之門屏幕查看進度。 打開星際之門屏幕。

english: Click on the nearby RUINED EQUIPMENT to instruct your crew to dismantle it into SCRAP METAL.
translation: 點擊附近的 “廢舊設備”，指示你的工作人員將其拆成廢金屬。

english: The ship is fitted with engines and an FTL drive for Interstellar Travel! But it does need a crew.\n\nOpen the TRADE screen.
translation: 這艘飛船裝有用於星際旅行的引擎和超光速驅動器！\n\n打開貿易界面。

english: We can stop dismantling by clicking the dismantle button again or by closing the construction menu.\n\nClose the menu by clicking the CONSTRUCTION button or by pressing ESC.
translation: 我們可以通過再次點擊拆解按鈕或關閉建造菜單來停止拆解。\n\n點擊“建造”按鈕或按下ESC鍵關閉菜單。

english: Use {PanUp1}{PanLeft1}{PanDown1}{PanRight1} or the ARROW KEYS to move the view around. Zoom the view using the MOUSE WHEEL, or {ZoomIn}/{ZoomOut} on the keyboard. Drag the view by holding the MIDDLE MOUSE BUTTON.
translation: 使用{PanUp1}{PanLeft1} {PanDown1} {PanRight1} 或箭頭鍵移動視圖。 使用鼠標滾輪或鍵盤上的{ZoomIn}/{ZoomOut} 縮放視圖。 按住鼠標中鍵拖動視圖。

english: We should give our engines a small test flight. To maneuver our ship, switch into TACTICAL mode by clicking the highlighted button, or pressing {ToggleTactical}.
translation: 我們應該對引擎進行一次小型試飛。要操縱飛船，請單擊高亮顯示的按鈕或按{ToggleTactical}，切換到“戰術”模式。

english: Exit TACTICAL mode by clicking the button again, or pressing {ToggleTactical}.
translation: 再次單擊按鈕或按{ToggleTactical} 退出 "戰術 "模式。

english: To get started, switch to TACTICAL mode by clicking the button or pressing {ToggleTactical}.
translation: 要開始操作，請單擊按鈕或按{ToggleTactical} ，切換到 "戰術 "模式。

english: Use the Maneuvering controls to move the ship into position.\n\nYou can also use the keys {ManoeuvreUp}, {ManoeuvreLeft}, {ManoeuvreDown}, {ManoeuvreRight} to move, and {ManoeuvreClockwise} and {ManoeuvreCounterClockwise} to rotate the ship.
translation: 使用機動控制將飛船移動到位。\n\n您還可以使用{ManoeuvreUp}、{ManoeuvreLeft}、{ManoeuvreDown}、{ManoeuvreRight} 鍵移動飛船，以及{ManoeuvreClockwise} 和{ManoeuvreCounterClockwise} 鍵旋轉飛船。

english: NOTE: You can SHIFT CLICK to buy in multiples of 5.
translation: 注意：您可以按 SHIFT 鍵 以 5 的倍數購買。

english: This vessel is fresh out of the shipyard production line. It's just an empty hull right now, without power or a breathable atmosphere. Our first job is to fix that. Click NEXT to continue.
translation: 這艘船剛剛從造船廠的生產線上駛出。 現在它只是一個空殼，沒有動力，也沒有可呼吸的大氣。我們的首要任務就是解決這個問題。 點擊下一步繼續。

english: Let's begin by installing a REACTOR, to generate power for our ship.\n\nClick into the CONSTRUCTION menu, then click INSTALL.
translation: 讓我們首先安裝一個反應堆，爲我們的飛船供電。\n\n點擊進入建造菜單，然後點擊安裝。

english: This is all the boxed equipment you have available on-board.\n\nSelect REACTOR from the list.
translation: 這是您船上所有可用的盒裝設備。\n\n從列表中選擇 REACTOR。

english: Stamp the REACTOR down inside your ship.
translation: 將 REACTOR 放置在飛船內部。

english: The REACTOR needs FUEL, and we use a FUEL LOADER to pump it to the REACTOR.\n\nSelect the FUEL LOADER from the Construction menu.
translation: 反應堆需要燃料，我們使用燃料裝載器將燃料泵送到反應堆。\n\n從 "建築 "菜單中選擇"燃料裝載器"。

english: Stamp the FUEL LOADER down somewhere near the REACTOR.
translation: 將燃料裝載器放置在反應堆附近的某個地方。

english: We need to connect the FUEL LOADER to the REACTOR, using a Pipe.\n\nSelect PIPES from the Construction Menu.
translation: 我們需要使用管道將燃料裝載器與反應堆連接起來。\n\n從 "建築 "菜單中選擇 "管道"。

english: Drag a pipe from the FUEL LOADER to the REACTOR, connecting the yellow pipe circles. FUEL PIPES are used to connect the output from one piece of equipment into the input of another. FUEL PIPES are yellow and must connect the yellow circles on equipment.
translation: 從燃料裝載器到反應堆拖拽一條管道，連接黃色的管道圈。 燃料管道用於將一個設備的輸出連接到另一個設備的輸入。 燃料管道爲黃色，必須連接設備上的黃色圓圈。

english: We now need to provide a breathable atmosphere for our crew. This is done with an AIRDUCT.\n\nInstall an AIRDUCT somewhere near the Reactor.
translation: 現在，我們需要爲船員提供一個可呼吸的環境。這是通過通風管完成的。\n\n在反應堆附近安裝一個通風管。

english: The AIRDUCT needs to be powered from the REACTOR. Select CABLES from the CONSTRUCTION menu.
translation: 通風管需要由反應堆供電。 從 “建造”菜單中選擇 “線纜”。

english: Drag a power cable from the REACTOR to the AIRDUCT, connecting the red circles. POWER CABLES are used to connect reactors to any equipment that needs power. POWER CABLES are red and must connect red circles on equipment.
translation: 將電力線纜從 反應堆 拖到 通風管，連接紅圈。 電力線纜用於連接反應堆和任何需要電源的設備。 電力線纜爲紅色，必須連接設備上的紅色圓圈。

english: The AIRDUCT needs OXYGEN, in the same way as the REACTOR needs FUEL. We can use an OXYGEN LOADER to provide OXYGEN.\n\nInstall an OXYGEN LOADER near the AIRDUCT.
translation: 通風管需要氧氣，就像反應堆需要燃料一樣。我們可以使用氧氣裝載器來提供氧氣。\n\n在通風管附近安裝氧氣裝載器。

english: We need to connect the OXYGEN LOADER into the AIRDUCT using PIPES.\n\nSelect PIPES from the CONSTRUCTION menu.
translation: 我們需要用管道將氧氣裝載器連接到通風管中。\n\n從建造菜單中選擇管道。

english: Drag a PIPE from the OXYGEN LOADER to the AIRDUCT, connecting the BLUE circles.
translation: 將一根管道從氧氣裝載器拖到通風管，連接藍色圓圈。

english: The AIRDUCT is activated and is pressurising the cabin! The atmosphere will soon be breathable.
translation: 通風管已啓動，正在給機艙加壓！大氣很快就可以呼吸了。

english: Engines require both POWER and FUEL to operate. We must connect both engines to fuel and power.
translation: 發動機的運行需要動力和燃料。我們必須將發動機與燃料和動力連接起來。

english: Now use the CABLES menu to power up the engine, by connecting it to your existing red power lines.
translation: 現在使用 CABLES（電纜）菜單，將其連接到現有的紅色電源線上，爲引擎供電。

english: The items we need are listed under PROPULSION. Select that category.
translation: 我們需要的物品列在 PROPULSION 分類下。請選擇該類別。

english: Add one FTL drive to our order by clicking on the entry in the list.
translation: 點擊列表中的條目，爲我們的訂單添加一個超光速驅動器。

english: FTL drives consume one fuel charge per jump. Add 5 FTL Charges to the order as well.
translation: 超光速驅動器每次跳躍消耗一個燃料充電。訂單中還需添加 5 個超光速燃料。

english: Install the FTL drive anywhere in your ship.
translation: 在飛船的任何位置安裝超光速驅動器。

english: Connect the FTL drive to your power network.
translation: 將 FTL 硬盤連接到電源網絡。

english: We can make things more efficient for our crew by telling them to store FTL Charges near the FTL drive.\n\nSelect STORAGE from the CONSTRUCTION toolbar, then select FTL Charges from the list.
translation: 通過讓船員將FTL裝藥存放在FTL驅動器附近，我們可以提高他們的工作效率。\n\n從建造工具欄中選擇存儲，然後從列表中選擇FTL裝藥。

english: Now drag out a storage zone near to the FTL drive.
translation: 現在，在超光速驅動器附近拖出一個儲存區。

english: The crew will move all the FTL Charges into this zone.
translation: 船員們將把所有超光速裝甲運到這個區域。

english: This screen shows the phases that require construction in order to complete the STARGATE.\n\nWe are in PHASE 1. Work has only just begun.
translation: 此屏幕顯示完成星際之門的建造所需的所有階段。\n\n我們正處於第 1 階段，工作纔剛剛開始。

english: On the left of the screen you can see the requirements to complete PHASE 1. We need to manufacture: - 100 STARGATE FRAMES - 10 STARGATE RESIN
translation: 在屏幕左側，您可以看到完成第 1 階段 的要求。 我們需要製造： - 100 個星形圖案框架 - 10 個星形圖案樹脂

english: These PHASE 1 components are easy to manufacture, and we already have what we need onboard.\n\nBut we can sell them to the STARGATE PROJECT for a small fortune.
translation: 這些PHASE 1 組件易於製造，我們船上已具備所需。\n\n但我們可以把它們賣給星際之門項目，賺一筆小錢。

english: Close the STARGATE screen by clicking on the toolbar again (or press ESC).
translation: 再次單擊工具欄（或按 ESC 鍵）關閉 STARGATE 屏幕。

english: We are now going to learn how to produce STARGATE FRAMES.
translation: 現在我們來學習如何製作星際之門框架。

english: Components are manufactured in a FABRICATOR, using raw materials like METAL INGOTS.\n\nInstall a FABRICATOR somewhere in the South East quadrant of the station.
translation: \n\n在空間站東南象限的某個地方安裝一臺製造機。

english: Those components are then assembled into finished products on an ASSEMBLY TABLE.\n\nInstall an ASSEMBLY TABLE somewhere near the FABRICATOR.
translation: 然後在組裝臺上將這些部件組裝成成品。\n在製造機附近安裝一個組裝臺。

english: This new equipment needs power. Build POWER CABLES to connect your REACTOR to the FABRICATOR and ASSEMBLY TABLE.
translation: 新設備需要電源。 製作電源線，將反應堆連接到製造臺和組裝臺。

english: We need to configure the new equipment to make the products that we want.\n\nRIGHT CLICK on the FABRICATOR to configure it.
translation: 我們需要對新設備進行配置，以便生產出我們想要的產品。\n\n右鍵單擊 FABRICATOR 進行配置。

english: This drop-down menu shows all of the components that we can manufacture in a FABRICATOR.\n\nSelect FRAME from the list.
translation: 此下拉菜單顯示我們可以在FABRICATOR中製造的所有組件。\n\n從列表中選擇FRAME。

english: We need to configure the ASSEMBLY TABLE in the same way.\n\nRIGHT CLICK on the assembly table.
translation: 我們需要以同樣的方式配置裝配表。\n\n右鍵單擊裝配表。

english: Select STARGATE FRAME from the drop-down menu.
translation: 從下拉菜單中選擇星際之門框架。

english: Close the Equipment Panel by clicking the X in the top right corner, or pressing ESC.
translation: 單擊右上角的 X 或按 ESC 鍵關閉設備面板。

english: Close the Equipment Panel by clicking the X in the top right corner, or pressing ESC.
translation: 單擊右上角的 X 或按 ESC 鍵關閉設備面板。

english: Your crew are now fabricating FRAMES out of METAL INGOTS, then assembling those FRAMES into STARGATE FRAMES, which we can sell to the STARGATE project for profit.
translation: 你們的工作人員現在正在用金屬錠製造框架，然後將這些框架組裝成星際之門框架，我們可以將這些框架賣給星際之門項目，從中獲利。

english: We are going to need a lot of METAL INGOTS if we're to make enough of those STARGATE FRAMES.\n\nWe don't have many METAL INGOTS on board, and will run out soon.
translation: 我們需要大量的金屬錠才能製造出足夠多的星際之門框架。\n\n我們船上的金屬錠不多，很快就會用完。

english: But we do have plenty of SCRAP METAL, and we can melt that down in a SMELTER.\n\nBuild a SMELTER somewhere near the production line.
translation: 不過我們確實有大量的廢金屬，我們可以在熔爐中將其熔化。\n\n在靠近生產線的地方建造一個熔爐。

english: Connect the smelters to the REACTOR using POWER CABLES
translation: 使用電源線將熔爐與反應堆連接起來

english: Right click on the SMELTER and set its material to be SCRAP METAL.
translation: 右鍵點擊 SMELTER，將其材質設置爲碎金屬。

english: The crew will now load in all the SCRAP METAL and smelt it into much more useful METAL INGOTS.
translation: 現在，工作人員將裝入所有廢金屬，並將其熔鍊成更有用的金屬錠。

english: There is a ton of RUINED EQUIPMENT around this old station, that we can break down into SCRAP METAL.\n\nSelect DISMANTLE from the CONSTRUCTION toolbar.
translation: 這老舊的基地附近有許多損壞的設備，我們可以將其拆解成廢金屬。\n\n從建造工具欄中選擇拆除。

english: We can make things more efficient for our crew by telling them to store SCRAP METAL near to the SMELTER.\n\nSelect STORAGE from the CONSTRUCTION toolbar, then select SCRAP METAL from the list.
translation: 通過告知我們的船員將廢金屬儲存在熔爐附近，我們可以提高他們的工作效率。\n\n從“建造”工具欄中選擇“儲存”，然後從列表中選擇“廢金屬”。

english: Now drag out a storage zone near to the SMELTER.
translation: 現在，在 SMELTER 附近拖出一個儲藏區。

english: The crew will move all the SCRAP METAL into this zone.
translation: 工作人員將把所有廢金屬運到這個區域。

english: Your crew will now use the equipment to produce some STARGATE FRAMES.
translation: 現在，您的船員將使用這些設備生產一些星際之門框架。

english: We can use the TRADE system to buy raw materials to produce more STARGATE FRAMES, as well as resources we will need to survive.\n\nReopen the TRADE screen.
translation: 我們可以使用貿易系統購買原材料來生產更多的星際之門框架，以及我們生存所需的資源。\n\n重新打開貿易界面。

english: METALLIC MINERALS can be smelted into METAL INGOTS just like SCRAP METAL.\n\nAdd all the METALLIC MINERALS to the trade.
translation: 金屬礦物可以像碎金屬一樣冶煉成金屬錠。\n\n將所有金屬礦物加入交易。

english: We will also need another SMELTER to begin processing those METALLIC MINERALS.\n\nFind the SMELTER under the INDUSTRY tab and add one to the order.
translation: 我們還需要一個冶煉器來開始加工這些金屬礦物。\n\n在“工業”選項卡下找到冶煉器，並在訂單中添加一個。

english: This is a good opportunity to stock up on some other resources that are critical for life support. We'd recommend you purchase: - 2x FUEL - 2x OXYGEN - 2x WATER - 2x FOOD - HIRE 5 MORE CREW CONFIRM the order when you are done.
translation: 這是補充一些維持生命所必需的其他資源的好機會。 我們建議您購買： - 2x 燃料 - 2x 氧氣 - 2x 水 - 2x 食物 - 僱用5名以上船員 完成後確認訂單。

english: Once those goods have arrived, you should install your second SMELTER somewhere near the first.
translation: 一旦這些貨物到達，您就應該把第二個 SMELTER 安裝在第一個 SMELTER 附近的某個地方。

english: Set the SMELTER to process those METALLIC MINERALS you bought into more METAL INGOTS.
translation: 設置 冶煉器，將您購買的金屬礦物加工成更多的金屬錠。

english: Well done, you are now all set to produce STARGATE FRAMES.
translation: 幹得好，您現在已經準備好製作星際之門框架了。

english: We will need a crew. Hire five CREW MEMBERS from the TRADE screen.
translation: 我們需要一名船員。從 貿易 界面僱傭五名船員。

english: NOTE: You can SHIFT CLICK to hire in multiples of 5.
translation: 注意：您可以按 SHIFT 鍵以 5 的倍數進行租用。

english: Those crew will also need SPACESUITS as there is no atmosphere onboard our ship yet.\n\nOrder five SPACESUITS for the new crew.
translation: 這些船員還需要空間站，因爲我們的船上還沒有大氣層。\n\n爲新船員訂購五個空間站。

english: We also need resources for the ship to function. Use the TRADE screen to buy: - 5x FUEL - 5x OXYGEN - 5x FTL CHARGE - 2x FOOD - 2x WATER. CONFIRM the trade when you are done.
translation: 我們還需要資源才能使飛船正常運行。 使用貿易屏幕購買： - 5x 燃料 - 5x 氧 - 5x 超光速燃料 - 2x 食物 - 2x 水。 完成後確認貿易。

english: We can directly control our engine THROTTLE from here.\n\nTry increasing your engine throttle with this control.
translation: 我們可以在這裏直接控制發動機的油門。\n\n，嘗試用這個控制器加大發動機油門。

english: We can also turn the ship by left clicking in TACTICAL mode, in the direction we wish to travel.
translation: 我們還可以在 “戰術” 模式下左鍵單擊飛船，使其轉向我們希望行進的方向。

english: We can send our ship to a specific location by RIGHT-CLICKING. Try setting a destination by right clicking in the tactical view.
translation: 我們可以通過右鍵單擊將飛船送往特定地點。請嘗試在戰術視圖中右擊設置目的地。

english: Your crew will continue to operate the ship and keep the engines running as you travel around. Try flying around the system until you have a handle on the controls.\n\nWhen you are ready, bring the ship to a stop by setting the THROTTLE to zero in TACTICAL mode.
translation: 您的船員將繼續操作飛船，並在您四處飛行時保持引擎運轉。請嘗試在系統內飛行，直到您掌握了控制方法。\n\n準備就緒後，在戰術模式下將油門調至零，使飛船停止。

english: Now that our ship is up and running, we need to earn our way. We can complete contracts for financial reward and reputation.\n\nOpen the CONTRACTS screen to see a list of available contracts.
translation: 現在我們的飛船已經啓動並開始運行，我們需要賺取自己的生活費。 我們可以通過完成合同來獲得經濟獎勵和聲譽。\n\n打開“合同”屏幕，查看可用合同列表。

english: Contracts are assigned to the ship you currently have selected.\n\nOnly the PROCYON can travel between locations, so select the PROCYON.
translation: 合同會分配給您當前選擇的飛船。\n\n只有 PROCYON 號可以在不同地點之間旅行，因此請選擇 PROCYON 號。

english: Here we have a TRANSPORT PASSENGER contract, click it to see more details.
translation: 這裏有一份運輸乘客合同，點擊查看更多詳情。

english: This mission requires us to transport a group of people from here to another location in the sector.\n\nClick the accept button to assign this contract to the PROCYON.
translation: 此任務要求我們將一羣人從此處運送到本區域的另一地點。\n\n點擊“接受”按鈕，將此合約分配給PROCYON。

english: The passengers will be delivered to the PROCYON by shuttle.
All passengers have been delivered to the PROCYON, and our FTL drive is operational. We must now plot an FTL jump to their destination.\n\nOpen the SECTOR MAP.
translation: 所有乘客都已被送上PROCYON號，我們的超光速傳動裝置也已啓動。我們現在必須規劃一次超光速跳躍，前往他們的目的地。\n\n打開 "星區地圖"。

english: This is a map of all the systems in this sector. Our ship and our space station are located in the middle, where the map is marked YOU-ARE-HERE. Set a course to the destination (labelled TRANSPORT PASSENGERS) by clicking on it.
translation: 這是本星區所有星系的地圖。 我們的飛船和空間站位於地圖中間標有“你在這裏”的位置。 點擊目的地（標有“運送”乘客），設定航線。

english: Close the SECTOR MAP by clicking the X in the top right corner, or by pressing ESC.
translation: 點擊右上角的 "X "或按 ESC 鍵關閉 "星區地圖"。

english: Open the FTL screen to order the FTL jump.
translation: 打開超光速屏幕，命令進行超光速跳躍。

english: Click on PREPARE JUMP to align the ship and prepare for hyperspace.
translation: 點擊 “準備跳躍” 對準飛船，準備進入超空間。

english: The PROCYON will align for hyperspace, and prepare the FTL drive to make the jump.
translation: PROCYON 號將對準超空間，並準備好超光速驅動裝置以進行跳躍。

english: Click the JUMP button to jump to hyperspace.
translation: 點擊 "跳躍 "按鈕跳轉到超空間。

english: We now need to turn in our completed passenger contract.\n\nOpen the CONTRACTS screen and select the passenger mission.
translation: 現在我們需要上交已完成的乘客合同。\n\n打開 “合同” 界面，選擇 “乘客任務”。

english: Click the DELIVER button to drop off the passengers and receive payment
translation: 點擊 "交付 "按鈕，運送乘客並收取報酬

english: The career you choose is now up to you. There are many opportunities to choose from, and you'll learn more as you work.\n\nOpen the CONTRACTS board.
translation: 您現在可以選擇自己的職業。 有很多機會可供選擇，在工作中你會學到更多。\n\n打開 “合同” 板。

english: We are now going to learn how to produce STARGATE RESIN.
translation: 現在我們來學習如何生產星際之門樹脂。

english: Turning our attention back to the Stargate, the Stargate project also requires us to produce STARGATE RESIN.\n\nWe are going to use the INDUSTRIOUS to collect METREON GAS, refine it, and process it into STARGATE RESIN.
translation: 將我們的注意力轉回星際之門，星際之門項目也要求我們生產星際之門樹脂。\n\n我們將使用勤勞號收集測地氣體，將其精煉，並加工成星際之門樹脂。

english: Raise enough money to purchase for INDUSTRIOUS: - 1x GAS COLLECTOR - 1x REFINERY - 1x CHEMICAL LAB
translation: 籌集足夠資金爲工業號購買： - 1x GAS COLLECTOR - 1x REFINERY - 1x CHEMICAL LAB

english: Before we can start collecting the METREON GAS, we need to move the INDUSTRIOUS to a system containing a GAS CLOUD.\n\nUse the SECTOR MAP to select a suitable destination.
translation: 在開始收集 METREON 氣體 之前，我們需要將 工業氣體 轉移到一個包含 氣體雲 的系統中。\n\n使用 “區域地圖” 選擇一個合適的目的地。

english: Close the sector map and use the FTL Window to jump the INDUSTRIOUS to the nebula.
translation: 關閉星區地圖，使用超光速窗口將工業號跳轉到星雲。

english: Install the GAS COLLECTOR, REFINERY and CHEMICAL LAB so that they are close to each other.
translation: 安裝氣體收集器、精煉廠和化學實驗室，使它們彼此靠近。

english: Power up the GAS COLLECTOR, REFINERY and CHEMICAL LAB.
translation: 啓動氣體收集器、精煉廠和化學實驗室。

english: Right click on the REFINERY and set its recipe to REFINE METREON GAS.
translation: 右鍵單擊精煉廠，將其配方設置爲精煉 METREON 氣體。

english: Right click on the CHEMICAL LAB and set its recipe to MAKE STARGATE RESIN.
translation: 右鍵單擊 "化學實驗室"，將其配方設置爲 "製造星際爭霸樹脂"。

english: Connect the GAS COLLECTOR to the REFINERY with a PIPE.
translation: 用一根管道將氣體收集器連接到精煉廠。

english: Connect the REFINERY to the CHEMICAL LAB with a PIPE.
translation: 用管道連接精煉廠和化學實驗室。

english: Well done, you have started to produce STARGATE RESIN.\n\nWhen you have produced enough, travel back to any COLONY, SHIP YARD or the STARGATE system to sell it to the STARGATE PROJECT.
translation: 幹得好，您已經開始生產星際之門樹脂了。\n\n當您生產了足夠的星際之門樹脂後，請返回任何殖民地、船塢或星際之門系統，將其出售給星際之門計劃。

english: In order to be able to dock successfully, your ship needs at least four working THRUSTERS.\n\nUse a different ship, or purchase and install four thrusters at a nearby trading post.
translation: 爲了能夠成功停靠，您的飛船至少需要四個工作的推進器。\n\n使用不同的飛船，或者在附近的貿易站購買並安裝四個推進器。

english: Zoom in so that you can see the docking guides more clearly. They are RED diamonds extending from the docking ports.
translation: 放大，以便更清楚地看到對接導軌。它們是從對接口延伸出來的紅色鑽石。

english: Use your THRUSTERS to maneuver your ship so that RED diamonds of your docking ports align with the docking port of the *X. When aligned correctly, they will both turn YELLOW. Keep the ships aligned until the docking bridge is fully extended.
translation: 使用推進器操縱飛船，使對接口的紅鑽與*X 的對接口對齊。 對齊後，它們都會變成黃色。 保持飛船對齊，直到對接橋完全伸出。

english: Select the UMC Astral Temptress. \n\n As you can see it has no crew.
translation: 選擇 UMC Astral Temptress。 \n\n 正如您所看到的，它沒有船員。

english: Select the SOURCE ship that the crew will come FROM.
translation: 選擇派出船員的源飛船。

english: Click in the CREW cell of the DESTINATION ship to request 5 crew to transfer.
translation: 點擊目標飛船的“船員”單元格，請求轉移 5 名船員。

english: NOTE: You can SHIFT CLICK to request transfer in multiples of 5.
translation: 注意：您可以按住 SHIFT 鍵點擊，以 5 的倍數請求轉移。

english: Your guns can also target specific points on enemy ships. First, select which guns you would like to use. You can SHIFT CLICK to select multiple guns.
translation: 您的火炮還可以瞄準敵艦上的特定點。 首先，選擇您要使用的火炮。 您可以 按住 Shift 點擊 來選擇多個火炮。

english: The effect of the EMP is wearing off!\n\nDeploy your weapons and make your crew ready to fight by clicking on BATTLE STATIONS.
translation: 電磁脈衝的效果正在消失！\n\n點擊 "戰鬥崗位"，部署你的武器，讓你的船員做好戰鬥準備。

english: Make sure to keep moving during combat, this increases your EVASION and makes you a harder target to hit.
translation: 確保在戰鬥中保持移動，這會增加你的 閃避率，使你成爲更難擊中的目標。

english: You will need a Mining Laser. These use a lot of power so consider installing extra reactors or batteries.\n\nInstall a MINING LASER and connect it to the power grid.
translation: 您需要一臺採礦激光器。這些設備需要消耗大量電力，因此可以考慮安裝額外的反應堆或電池。\n\n安裝一個採礦激光器，並將其連接到電網。

english: Make sure to UNDOCK from any other ship (from the TACTICAL screen).
translation: 確保與任何其他船隻解鎖（從戰術屏幕）。

english: Look at the rocks on the map, these indicate ASTEROID BELTS. \n\nFly to a system in an asteroid belt, it will probably contain Tilium Ore.
translation: 查看地圖上的岩石，這些岩石表示小行星帶。\n\n飛往小行星帶中的一個星系，那裏可能有鈦礦石。

english: You can also target specific mineral patches. First, select which laser you would like to use. You can SHIFT CLICK to select multiple lasers.
translation: 您還可以瞄準特定的礦脈。 首先，選擇您要使用的激光。 您可以按住 SHIFT 點擊 來選擇多個激光。

english: Drones will collect mined resources.\n\nInstall a DRONE BAY so your drones can collect the Tilium Ore.
translation: 無人機將收集開採出的資源。\n\n安裝一個無人機艙，這樣無人機就可以收集鈦礦石。

english: You also need to make sure that GATHER MATERIALS is enabled in FLEET ORDERS.
translation: 您還需要確保在 “船隊訂單” 中啓用了 “收集材料” 功能。

english: You will need to smelt the raw Tilium Ore to crystals.\n\nInstall a SMELTER.
translation: 您需要將未加工的鈦礦石熔鍊成晶體。\n\n安裝熔煉爐。

english: Right click on the SMELTER and select TILIUM ORE to smelt it into Tilium Crystals.
translation: 右鍵點擊 "熔煉爐"，選擇 "鈦礦石"，將其熔鍊成鈦礦晶體。

english: Click on the JMC MINING STATION, an old unused industrial station for sale.
translation: 點擊 JMC MINING STATION，這是一個待售的閒置舊工業站。

english: Click on the BUY button to purchase the JMC MINING STATION.
translation: 點擊購買按鈕，購買JMC MINING STATION。

english: Well done, you have purchased the JMC MINING STATION.
translation: 幹得好，您已經購買了 JMC MINING STATION。

english: When searching in lists, ignore accented characters, e.g. "é" will match "e"
translation: 在列表中搜索時忽略重音字符，例如 “é” 將匹配 “e”
上傳到蒸汽工作室的船隻

english: We are now going to learn how to deploy our weapons for combat.\n\nThe game has been paused for now.
Your crew will run to the weapons to deploy them.\n\nGatling guns don't require any crew to deploy them.
translation: \n\n加特林機槍不需要任何人員來部署。

english: The gun barrels will begin to extend when they arrive.\n\nWhen the barrels are fully extended they will be ready to fire!
translation: \n\n當槍管完全伸出時，就可以開火了！

english: Well done, your weapons are now successfully deployed for battle!
translation: 幹得好，你們的武器已成功部署到戰鬥中！

english: We are now going to learn how to jump using the newly powered-up Stargate.
translation: 現在，我們要學習如何使用剛剛啓動的星際之門進行跳躍。

english:
The Stargate currently has lost power and needs to be started again.

Use energy transmitters to power the Stargate.

When the Stargate is ready, we will try again!
translation:
星際之門目前失去動力，需要重新啓動。

使用能量發射器爲星際之門提供動力。

當星際之門準備就緒時，我們將再次嘗試！

english: Let's have a look at your ship in the Stargate system.\n\nStargate jumps can only be performed from the Stargate system.
translation: 讓我們來看看您在星際之門系統中的飛船。\n\n星際之門跳躍只能在星際之門系統中進行。

english: We will need to abort the jump that's currently planned.
translation: 我們需要中止目前計劃的跳傘。

english: When no jump is planned on the sector map, you can align your fleet for a Stargate jump.
translation: 當星區地圖上沒有跳躍計劃時，您可以調整艦隊進行星際之門跳躍。

english: Great! The selected ships will now align for the jump.
translation: 太好了！現在，選定的飛船將對準跳躍。

english: Your fleet is ready to jump to the new sector!\n\nYou can come back to this sector by performing another Stargate jump.
translation: 您的艦隊已準備好跳轉到新的星區！\n\n您可以通過執行另一次星際之門跳轉回到這個星區。

english: Well done. You can now jump between sectors!
translation: 幹得好您現在可以在不同區之間跳轉了！

english: Sell your manufactured parts to submit them to the Stargate project
translation: 出售你製造的零件，將它們提交給星際之門項目
已訂閱 Steam 創意工坊
已上傳至 Steam 創意工坊
仙女座項目第 4、5 階段

english: OPTIONAL: Install engines in the A.J.E Foundry
translation: 可選： 在 A.J.E 鑄造廠安裝引擎

english: Ship needs either hull or scaffolding to be brought into hyperspace
translation: 飛船需要船體或腳手架才能進入超空間

english: The game failed to save to the cloud, the game has been saved locally instead.\n\nPlease check that you have enough storage in the Steam Cloud and try again.
translation: \n\n請檢查您的 Steam 雲存儲空間是否足夠，然後重試。
所有船隻必須進入跳躍門

english: The new gas we've observed seems to be quite unstable and is radiating high amounts of energy, our scientists need to find a safe way to collect and stabilise it.
translation: 我們觀測到的這種新氣體似乎很不穩定，正在輻射出大量的能量，我們的科學家需要找到一種安全的方法來收集和穩定這種氣體。

english: Stable Zeleon is a safe, energy-dense gas that could be used for advanced energy storage.
translation: 穩定宙龍是一種安全的高能量氣體，可用於先進的能源存儲。

english: The mineral collected from the local asteroid has never been seen before, we should investigate its uses.
translation: 從當地小行星上採集到的礦物以前從未見過，我們應該研究一下它的用途。

english: Infuse energy storage with Neubidium, providing it with enhanced efficiency and improved conductive properties.
translation: 爲儲能注入 Neubidium，使其具有更高的效率和更好的導電性能。

english: The Jumpgate at the end of this sector has some requirements before it can be used.
translation: 本星區末端的跳躍門在使用前需要滿足一些條件。

english: The Jumpgate is damaged, and must be repaired and re-aligned.
translation: 跳躍門已損壞，必須進行修復並重新校準。

english: There is a TRANSIT FEE to pay for use of the Jumpgate. This money covers the operating costs and energy consumption of such a massive facility.
translation: 使用跳躍門需支付通行費。這筆費用用於支付此龐大設施的運營成本及能源消耗。

english: We need some maintainence supplies before the jumpgate can be used.
translation: 在使用跳躍門之前，我們需要一些維護物資。

english: Thank you, payment received for transit.
Thank you, the Jumpgate has been repaired and re-aligned.
translation: 謝謝，跳躍門已修復並重新校準。

english: The Jumpgate is now ready for use.
translation: 跳躍門現在可以使用了。

english: Please maneuver all fleet ships into the jumpgate and align for transit.
translation: 請將艦隊所有艦船駛入跳躍門，並對準以進行傳送。

english: A fleet of hostile ships is attempting to blockade the jumpgate and extort money from ships passing through.
translation: 一支敵對艦隊正試圖封鎖跳躍門，向通過的船隻勒索錢財。

english: You'll need to clear them out before we can safely activate the jumpgate.
translation: 在我們能安全啓動跳躍門之前，你需要先清除他們。

english: A large piece of equipment, capable of transmitting up to 200MW to the Stargate.
translation: 一個大型設備，能夠向星門傳輸高達 200 兆瓦的電力。

english: The stargate isn't being supplied with enough power. Use energy transmitters to supply the Stargate with power.
translation: 星門沒有獲得足夠的能量。使用能量發射器爲星門供電。

english: Thank you, Captain! We would never have survived without your assistance.
translation: 謝謝你，艦長！如果沒有你的幫助，我們絕對無法倖存。

english: If you'd be interested, we'd be honoured to join forces with your fleet.
translation: 如果你感興趣，我們將很榮幸加入你的艦隊。

english: Investigate a distress call in system S*X.
translation: 調查S*X 星系中的求救信號。

english: Complete any story episode in 'Boldly Go' to unlock
translation: 完成“勇往直前”中的任意章節以解鎖

english: Due to new phases or storylines surrounding the stargate, your stargate progress has been reset.
translation: 由於圍繞星際之門的新階段或故事情節，您的星際之門進度已重置。

english: Unlocks Phases 4 and 5 of the Andromeda Project.
translation: 解鎖仙女座計劃的第 4 和第 5 階段。

english: The damaged ship is nearby in system S*X. Hurry!
translation: 受損飛船就在附近的S*X 星系。快點！

english: The hostile ships are located at system S*X.
Luckily there is just such an asteroid belt nearby, within this sector, in system S*X.
translation: 幸運的是，附近就有這樣一個小行星帶，位於本星區的S*X 星系。

english: You have destroyed the enemy forces in system S*X. Payment of $*Y is coming your way.
translation: 你已消滅S*X 星系的敵軍。報酬$*Y 即將到賬。

english: Investigate a distress call in system S*X.
translation: 調查S*X 星系中的求救信號。

english: The ship's main source of forward thrust.  Must be supplied with Fuel (via a pipe) and Power (via a cable).
translation: 飛船前進推力的主要來源。  必須提供燃料（通過管道）和動力（通過電纜）。

english: Captain, the Stargate is ready for its first test. If supplied with enough power it should provide us access to a nearby uncharted sector.
translation: 艦長，星際之門已準備好進行首次測試。如果供電充足，它應該能讓我們進入附近的未知星區。

english: Many different types of contract are now available to you.\n\nHowever, you must stay alert, Captain. There are reports of even more lucrative opportunities that you'll have to find by yourself.
translation: \n\n不過，你必須保持警惕，艦長。有報道稱，你必須自己去尋找更加有利可圖的機會。

english: Well done, you have produced Tilium Cystals.
translation: 幹得好，你已經生產出了鈦礦晶體。

english: There is a crisis underway, Captain.  Commercial vessels are going missing, all across the sector.  I suspect foul play, and I need your help to investigate.
translation: 現在危機四伏 艦長  整個區域都有商船失蹤  我懷疑是謀殺 我需要你協助調查

english: I've marked the location of the shipwreck on your map as a Gold Highlight.  Good luck, Captain.
translation: 我已經在你的地圖上將沉船位置標爲黃金亮點。  祝你好運，艦長。

english: They're sending the recovered wreckage to your ship The L*X now, Captain. It will arrive soon by Shuttle. You'll need to store it somewhere onboard.
translation: 他們正在把打撈上來的殘骸送往你的飛船L*X ，艦長。穿梭機很快就會到達你需要把它存放在船上的某個地方。

english: Standby while I dock my ship with yours, Captain, to collect the items you've recovered so far. Thank you for your efforts.
translation: 艦長，請稍候，我將我的飛船與你的飛船對接，去收集你目前已經找到的物品。謝謝你的努力

english: We need to find a way to track them down, and destroy them.  We will be in touch soon, Captain.
translation: 我們得想辦法追蹤並摧毀他們  我們會盡快聯繫你的，艦長

english: The Reactor is reaching critical levels, Captain.  I can't stop it from overloading.
translation: 反應堆已經達到臨界水平，艦長  我無法阻止它超載

english: Well done, Captain.  Your intervention prevented a further loss of life.  And now we know the pirate vessel is crewed by cowards, a fact that we intend to use to our advantage.
translation: 幹得好，艦長。  你的干預避免了更多的生命損失  現在我們知道海盜船上的船員都是懦夫了，我們打算利用這一點來取得優勢。

english: I appreciate your speed in rescuing the crew of the Orion Sentinel, Captain.
translation: 艦長，感謝你迅速營救獵戶座哨兵號的船員。

english: Thank you, Captain.  Protect your fleet, and wait for our call.
translation: 謝謝你，艦長  保護好你的艦隊 等待我們的召喚

english: For years now my brother and I have been studying the high energy particle emissions in orbit of the black hole you can see behind us.  Its official designation is Qz247 - the collapsed remnants of a star that lived a couple of billion years ago.
translation: 多年來，我和弟弟一直在研究我們身後黑洞軌道上的高能粒子輻射。它的正式名稱是 Qz247——幾十億年前一顆恆星的坍縮殘餘物。

english: Thank you for offering your services, Captain.
translation: 謝謝您提供的服務，艦長。

english: I'm sending a shuttle to you now, Captain. Get your crew to load the Hyperspace Isotopes for me.
translation: 我現在派穿梭機去找您，艦長。讓您的船員給我裝上超空間同位素。

english: Thank you, Captain. I now have what I need to modify this FTL drive for the Short Range Hop.
translation: 謝謝您，艦長。我現在有了改裝短程跳躍超光速驅動器所需的東西。

english: It looks like you have enough Tilium Crystals.  Bring the Tilium Crystals back to me to close the contract.
translation: 看來您有足夠的提裏姆晶體了。把提裏姆晶體帶回來給我，以完成合同。

english: I'll send the shuttle to collect the Tilium Crystals. Thank you, Captain!
translation: 我會派穿梭機去收集提裏姆晶體。謝謝您，艦長！

english: Excellent work, Captain.  I'll begin synthesising the FTL charges immediately.  It will take me a little while.
translation: 幹得好，艦長。我馬上開始合成超光速充能。這需要一點時間。

english: Greetings, Captain.  I'm a representative of the Stargate Project.
translation: 您好，艦長。我是星際之門計劃的代表。

english: When the accident occurred, the younger twin Marcus was collecting vital data on black hole Qz247.  Data that is simply impossible to acquire by any other means.  Data that we need to complete the Stargate.
translation: 事故發生時，雙胞胎弟弟馬庫斯正在收集黑洞 Qz247 的重要數據。這些數據用任何其他方法都無法獲得。我們需要這些數據來完成星際之門。

english: Everything is ready, Captain.  I've produced the Hyperspace Modulators and the FTL fuel is already loaded.
translation: 一切準備就緒，艦長。超空間調製器已經制作完成，超光速燃料也已裝載完畢。

english: This has been a long time coming, Captain.  I've been working on this rescue for years.  Time dilation effects from the Black Hole mean that only a few hours will have passed for my brother.  It will be a surprise to him just how much time has passed when you bring him out.
translation: 艦長，這一天我已經等了很久了。我爲這次營救準備了很多年。黑洞產生的時間膨脹效應意味着我弟弟只過了幾個小時。當您把他帶出來的時候，他一定會很驚訝時間到底過去了多久。

english: Let's run over the plan one last time.  You're going to perform an incredibly short range Hyperspace Hop, and you'll emerge directly on top of my brother's ship.  Dock with his ship, rescue him and then get out of there.  Hop in, Rescue, Hop out.
translation: 讓我們最後複習一遍計劃。您要進行一次超短程超空間跳躍，您會直接出現在我弟弟的飛船上方。與他的飛船對接，營救他，然後離開那裏。跳進去，營救，跳出來。

english: Good luck, Captain. I'll see you on the other side.
translation: 祝您好運，艦長。另一邊見。

english: Greetings, Captain.  Good luck with the rescue.  Remember the data onboard Marcus' ship is extremely valuable to us.  You'll need Marcus to transmit the data from his console before you can complete the rescue.
translation: 您好，艦長。祝您營救順利。記住馬庫斯飛船上的數據對我們來說非常寶貴。在完成營救之前，您需要馬庫斯從控制檯傳送數據。

english: Dock your ship with mine, Captain, and tell me when you're ready for me to come on board.  Please hurry!
translation: 艦長，將您的飛船與我的對接，準備好讓我登船時告訴我。請快點！

english: The Stargate data?  I can send that, Captain, but you'll have to give me a few minutes to access the data and set up the transmission.
translation: 星際之門數據？我可以發送，艦長，但您得給我幾分鐘時間來獲取數據和設置傳輸。

english: My ship is falling apart from the gravitional forces, Captain.  I've sent the data that I can.  Please hurry and get me off this ship!
translation: 我的飛船正在被重力分解，艦長  我已經發送了我能發送的數據  請快點讓我離開這艘船

english: The reactor containment has failed, Captain.  The cabin is being flooded with radiation.  You have to get me out of here!
translation: 反應堆安全殼失效了，艦長  船艙正被輻射淹沒  你必須把我弄出去

english: I'm onboard, Captain.  Get us out of here!
translation: 我在船上，艦長  帶我們離開這裏

english: Thank you so much, Captain. I couldn't have succeeded without your help. I'm so grateful you took my call and were here for us when we needed you.
translation: 非常感謝你，艦長。沒有你的幫助我不可能成功我非常感謝你接了我的電話 在我們需要你的時候出現在我們身邊

english: We're really disappointed in your choices, Captain.  You've let us down and you've let the whole Stargate Project down, with your incredibly narrow thinking.
translation: 我們對你的選擇真的很失望 艦長  你讓我們失望，也讓整個星際之門計劃失望 你的思維太狹隘了

english: Well done on retrieving some of the data, Captain.  We would have preferred all of it, but we appreciate the rescue was under extreme duress.
translation: 艦長，你能找回部分數據，做得很好。  我們本希望能得到全部數據，但我們理解這次營救是在極端危急的情況下進行的。

english: Congratulations, Captain, on successfully recovering the science data from the stricken vessel.  This data represents a huge step forward in our understanding of high energy physics, and will hugely accelerate the Stargate Program.
translation: 祝賀你，艦長，成功地從遇難飛船上回收了科學數據。  這些數據代表着我們對高能物理的理解向前邁進了一大步，並將大大加快星際之門計劃的進程。

english: Congratulations, Captain. Your performance in the destruction of the Pirate Vessel exceeded all expectations!
translation: 祝賀你，艦長你們在摧毀海盜船過程中的表現超出了所有人的預期！

english: Farewell, Captain. Your dedication to justice and the safety of our sector will be remembered.
translation: 永別了，艦長。我們將銘記你對正義和我們星區安全的奉獻。

english: Are you kidding me! They've... They've reproduced! We've just witnessed an interstellar life form, spontaneously reproducing!
translation: 開什麼玩笑？他們...它們繁殖了我們剛剛目睹了一種星際生命體 自發地進行繁殖

english: Incredible work, Captain. I can't believe how much we've seen, in such a short period of time.
translation: 了不起的工作，艦長真不敢相信我們在這麼短的時間內看到了這麼多。

english: These findings will make an incredible research paper, Captain.  I'll be sure to credit you as the pilot who found the first living specimens.  I would offer to name the creatures after you, but they already have a name, so apologies for not being able to honour that tradition.
translation: 這些發現將成爲一篇出色的研究論文 艦長  我一定會把你列爲發現第一批活體標本的飛行員。  我本想用你的名字爲這些生物命名，但它們已經有名字了，所以很抱歉不能尊重這一傳統。

english: Anyway, thank you for your work, Captain. Here's a reward for your efforts.
translation: 無論如何，謝謝你的工作，艦長。這是對你努力的回報

english: Welcome back, Captain! I must say, the corridors at the Institute have been alive with excitement over this wondrous new lifeform. My paper has already been provisionally accepted into all the top nature journals, which makes me so proud.
translation: 歡迎回來 艦長我得說，研究所的走廊裏都在爲這種奇妙的新生命形式而興奮不已。我的論文已經被所有頂級自然雜誌暫時錄用，這讓我非常自豪。

english: We need you to take the tiddlets on a series of specific hyperspace jumps. We will be recording the effect on their reproductive process and on their physiology. All... well, most of these experiments can be done hopefully without any harm coming to the creatures.
translation: 我們需要你帶着小蝌蚪進行一系列特定的超空間跳躍。我們將記錄下對它們繁殖過程和生理機能的影響所有......好吧，大部分實驗都可以在不傷害生物的情況下完成。

english: But with your permission, we can begin. Install the new sensors first, Captain. And be sure to stock up on FTL fuel if you need to. Three or four jumps ought to be enough.
translation: 但如果你允許，我們可以開始了先安裝新的傳感器 艦長如果需要的話，一定要儲備好超光速燃料 And be sure to stock up on FTL fuel if you need to.三四次跳躍應該足夠了 Three or four jumps ought to be enough.

english: *X Tiddlets so far.  This is all working very well, Captain.  Now onto the real science.
translation: *X 到目前爲止都是  一切順利 艦長  現在開始真正的科學

english: *X Tiddlets now on board!  Fascinating, Captain.  It appears the Tiddlet reproductive process occurs even at incredibly short hyperspace distances.\nHow do they find the time?
translation: *X 蒂德爾斯上船了  真有趣，艦長  看來，即使在超空間距離極短的情況下，提德雷特的繁殖過程也會發生。 ，他們是怎麼找到時間的？\n

english: That's such a horrible thing to witness.\nWe can't allow this sort of experiment to be done again, doctor. It's so unethical.
translation: \n我們不能允許這種實驗再次發生 醫生這太不道德了。

english: There's something else.  There's a reading showing up on the sensors, deep inside the core of the dead tiddlets.\nBring them all back to me, Captain. I think we've done enough for today.
translation: 還有別的東西  傳感器上顯示出了一個讀數 就在死去的小鱈魚的核心深處\n把他們都帶回來給我 艦長我想我們今天做得夠多了

english: The work continues, Captain. There is so much more to these Tiddlets than we realised.
translation: 工作還在繼續 艦長這些提德爾特人比我們想象的要多得多

english: I don't think I had the chance to properly thank you, Captain. You risked your life for us.  And now my twin is ten years older than me! It's taken some getting used to.
translation: 我想我還沒機會好好感謝你，艦長你爲我們冒了生命危險  現在我的雙胞胎比我大十歲我得適應一下

english: I've put the rescue ship up for sale. I was asking $1M, but you can have it for half that price if you like.  Thank you, Captain.  You'll always be welcome with us.
translation: 我已經把救援船掛牌出售了。我開價100萬美元，但如果你願意，可以半價賣給你。  謝謝你，艦長  我們永遠歡迎你

english: Incredible work, Captain. I'm not sure how you managed that, but I'm true to my word.  I'll wire the funds to Dr. Martinez, with a sales bonus of $100k for you.  Bring the ship back to the Institute, and let's put it to use.
translation: 幹得漂亮，艦長我不知道你是怎麼做到的 但我說到做到  我會把錢匯給馬丁內斯博士 還會給你10萬美元的銷售獎金  把飛船開回研究所 讓我們好好利用它

english: Hello, Captain.  How have you been? Things have been tough here.
translation: 你好 艦長  最近好嗎？這裏的日子不好過

english: I hope it was worth it for you, Captain.
translation: 我希望這對你來說是值得的，艦長。

english: Good work, Captain. That's a good price.  I'll send the funds to Dr Martinez.  You've earned a sales bonus of $40k.  Bring the ship back to the Institute, and let's put it to use.
translation: 幹得好 艦長這個價錢不錯  我會把錢寄給馬丁內斯醫生 I'll send the funds to Dr Martinez.  你已經獲得了4萬美元的銷售獎金  把飛船開回研究所 讓我們好好利用它

english: I don't want to talk to you, Captain.  Yes, the ship is for sale.  Take it.  I don't ever want to see that ship, or you, again.  Do not call me again.
translation: 我不想跟你說話 艦長  是的，這艘船要賣  拿去吧  我不想再見到那艘船 也不想再見到你  別再打電話給我

english: Excellent.  It's working, as I knew it would.  Give us three more hops, Captain.
translation: 好極了。  我就知道會成功的  再給我們三跳，艦長

english: Dismantle the Hop Drive, Captain, and I'll send a shuttle to collect it.  I want you to replace the Hop Drive with a conventional FTL drive, for the final part of the experiment.  I'll send a replacement FTL drive in the delivery shuttle.
translation: 艦長，把霍普驅動器拆了 我會派穿梭機去取的  我想讓你用傳統的超光速驅動器 替換掉 "合 "驅動器 作爲實驗的最後一部分  我會用送貨穿梭機送一個新的超光速驅動器過來

english: You know what to do, Captain.  A couple of very long jumps ought to be enough.  Bring them all back to me when it's done.
translation: 你知道該怎麼做 艦長  跳幾下就夠了  完成後把他們都帶回來給我

english: Well done, Captain.  Everything has worked exactly as I predicted, and we now have an excellent harvest on the farm ship.  More importantly, you've shown the way.
translation: 幹得好，艦長。  一切都在我的預料之中 我們的農船現在豐收了  更重要的是，你爲我們指明瞭方向。

english: I think I can take it from here, Captain.  My engineers tell me they'll have the Hop Drive fitted to the farm ship in just a few days.  In fact, we are close to automating the entire Tiddlet Harvest process with this one ship.
translation: 我想我可以接手，艦長  我的工程師告訴我 幾天內他們就能把 "合 "傳動裝置 安裝到農場船上了  事實上，我們就快要用這艘船 實現整個提德雷收穫過程的自動化了

english: I knew we could rely on you, Captain.  Thank you for showing the highest degrees of professionalism.
translation: 我知道我們可以依靠你，艦長。  謝謝你表現出的高度專業精神。

english: Mark my words, Captain.  You will bitterly regret crossing me.
translation: 記住我的話，艦長  你會後悔和我作對的

english: I'll be in touch if I need your help, Captain.
translation: 如果需要你的幫助，我會聯繫你的，艦長。

english: You have to help us, Captain.
Oh god... they're in the food stuffs!
Oh god... they're in the air-conditioning system!
translation: 天啊......它們在空調系統裏！

english: Oh god... they're in the reactor room!
translation: 天啊......他們在反應堆室裏！

english: I want to thank you for helping, Captain, when it counted. For doing the right thing. I'll split the remaining grant money I have with you. You deserve it.
translation: 我要感謝你在關鍵時刻伸出援手，艦長。做了正確的事我會把剩下的補助金分給你這是你應得的

english: But I'd recommend you never bring a third aboard.  Look after them, Captain. I know you will.
translation: 但我建議你不要帶第三個人上船  照顧好他們，艦長我知道你會的

english: I suggest you look after them from now on, Captain. It won't atone for the things you've done, but it's a start.
translation: 我建議你從現在開始照顧他們，艦長這不能彌補你做過的事 但這是個開始

english: I suspect foul play here, Captain. There's no way a ship like the Celestial Hammer would just vanish. Something must have happened, and I'm assuming the worst.
translation: 我懷疑這裏面有貓膩，艦長像 "天錘號 "這樣的飛船不可能就這麼消失了一定發生了什麼事，我猜是最壞的情況

english: I have to know what happened, Captain.
translation: 我必須知道發生了什麼 艦長

english: Thank you, Captain.  I appreciate the prompt payment.
translation: 謝謝你，艦長。  感謝您及時付款
付款已收到，謝謝你，艦長。

english: I've received my share.  Excellent work, Captain.
translation: 我已經收到了我的那份。  幹得好，艦長。

english: Batches of completed parts may now be submitted to the Andromeda Project through the open Marketplace. You will find our buyers ready to release funds for any parts manufactured to specification.
translation: 現在可以通過開放市場向仙女座計劃提交一批已完成的部件。您會發現我們的買家隨時準備爲任何按規格生產的部件發放資金。

english: Fantastic work, Captain.  I had high expectations, but the process was even more smooth than I hoped.  We've made ourselves known to the Andromeda Project now, but this is just the beginning.
translation: 幹得漂亮，艦長。  我的期望很高 但過程比我想象的還要順利  我們已經讓仙女座計劃知道我們了 但這只是個開始

english: Welcome back, Captain.  I've been taking a look at the schematics published by the Andromeda Project, and the next phase is going to need a huge upgrade to our facilities.
translation: 歡迎回來，艦長  我看了一下仙女座計劃公佈的圖紙 下一階段我們需要對設施進行大規模升級

english: The first part is a Stargate Actuator.  This is something we can manufacture in our existing factory station, although it's a more complex production chain.  There won't be nearly enough resources available in the Marketplace, so we'll have to mine the local belt for minerals.
translation: 第一個部件是星際之門傳動器。  我們可以在現有的工廠站製造，不過生產鏈比較複雜。  市場上沒有足夠的資源，所以我們必須在當地的礦帶開採礦物。

english: One last thing, Captain.  I'm sure you've noticed, we aren't exactly surrounded by asteroids here.  I suggest you pair the station up with one of your FTL capable vessels, and jump them both to a suitable mining location.  You can leave the station there to do its work.
translation: 最後一件事，艦長。我相信你已經注意到了，我們這裏並沒有被小行星包圍。我建議你把空間站和你的一艘超光速飛船配對，然後把它們都跳躍到一個合適的採礦地點。你可以把空間站留在那裏工作。

english: Time is now of the essence, Captain.  All three parts need to be produced, and I'm in more of a hurry than you may realise.  Keep me informed!
translation: 時間緊迫，艦長  所有三個部分都要製作完成 我比你想象的還要着急  隨時通知我

english: You'll need all of that equipment to get started.  I'd recommend Collectors, Refineries, and Chemical Labs, four each at least.  You'll also want Storage Tanks to buffer the intermediate products, and an upgrade to the Power Grid.
translation: 你需要所有這些設備才能開始工作。  我建議使用採集器、精煉廠和化學實驗室，至少各四個。  您還需要儲藏罐來緩衝中間產品，並升級電網。

english: The final stage is to install a Loader or two, and set them to 'UNLOAD'.  This will instruct your crew to barrel up the stable isotopes and store them in the cargo hold so you can easily sell them on the Marketplace.
translation: 最後一個階段是安裝一兩個裝載器，並將其設置爲 "卸載"。  這將指示你的船員把穩定同位素裝進桶裏，然後儲存在貨艙裏，這樣你就可以很容易地在市場上出售它們了。

english: Excellent work, Captain.  On time and to specification, as usual.  The Andromeda Project have enough of that item now, so you may as well stop production and save the energy and materials.
translation: 幹得好，艦長。  像往常一樣準時，符合規格  仙女座計劃已經有足夠的材料了 所以你最好停止生產，節省能源和材料

english: We are all done, Captain.  That was an incredible display of industrialised power.  There's nobody even close to us in the Marketplace, and we basically are the Andromeda Project.  They need us now.
translation: 我們都完成了，艦長  這真是工業化力量的驚人展示  市場上沒人比得上我們 我們就是仙女座計劃  他們現在需要我們

english: You should know that my Doctors continue to bring me bad news.  Each time I talk to them... well, I don't know how long I have left.  This will be my final project.  I just hope I have time to finish it.
translation: 你應該知道，我的醫生不斷給我帶來壞消息。  每次我和他們談話......我都不知道自己還能活多久。  這將是我的最後一個項目  我只希望能有時間完成它

english: One or more of your auto-orders have been made inactive. This may be because you owe a large payment to X.
translation: 您的一個或多個自動訂單已失效。這可能是因爲您欠 X 一大筆貨款。
在冶煉廠附近儲存廢金屬 [*X/10]
在冶煉廠附近儲存金屬錠 [*X/10]

english: To any vessel, we are under attack!  Please help, we won't last much longer!
translation: 呼叫所有船隻，我們正遭受攻擊！請支援，我們撐不了多久了！

english: Further improves crop yield, and unlocks schematics to manufacture Hydroponics Modules
translation: 進一步提高作物產量，並解鎖製造水培模塊的原理圖

english: We hope you enjoyed playing the demo of The Last Starship. Your journey has just begun!  Unlock the full game to explore more Story Episodes, Survival Mode, Arena Mode, a full Ship Editor and more!
translation: 希望您喜歡《最後的星艦》試玩版。您的旅程纔剛剛開始！  解鎖完整版遊戲，探索更多故事情節、生存模式、競技場模式、完整的飛船編輯器等！
AI 控制 - 自動選擇
人工智能控制 - 極近軌道
人工智能控制 - 近軌道
人工智能控制 - 中程
人工智能控制 - 遠程
人工智能控制--掃射運行

english: Improves crop yield to produce more food per cycle
translation: 提高作物產量，每個週期生產更多食物

english: SECTOR OBJECTIVE: Protect ship under attack
translation: 星區目標：保護受到攻擊的船隻
