english: A commercial vessel is under attack from an unknown hostile enemy. They have already taken heavy damage.
translation: 一艘商船正遭受不明敵軍襲擊，且已嚴重受損。

english: We've marked the location of the ship on your map. Please hurry!
translation: 我們已在地圖上標記了該船位置。請抓緊時間！

english: The vessel is under attack! Fight off the hostile ships before it's too late.
translation: 該船正遭受攻擊！在爲時已晚前擊退敵艦。

english: *X of the *Y enemy ships have been destroyed.
Unfortunately the ship has been destroyed.
translation: 不幸的是，該船已被摧毀。

english: You currently have *X residents within your fleet.

translation: 我們已經在你們的地圖上標出了敵對勢力的位置。狩獵愉快

english: You have located the hostile forces! Destroy them immediately.
translation: 您已找到敵軍！立即消滅他們。

english: You have destroyed *X hostiles out of *Y
All hostile forces have been destroyed. Total payment $*X.
translation: 所有敵對勢力已被摧毀。付款總額$*X.

english: The remaining hostile forces have escaped.

translation: 被摧毀的*X/*Y 敵對勢力
採礦合同：提取關鍵礦物

english: There is huge demand for FTL fuel cells, to power the evacuation ships.
translation: 超光速燃料電池的需求量巨大，可以爲撤離船提供動力。

english: We can manufacture FTL Fuel, but we need Tilium ore that can only be found in certain asteroid belts.
translation: 我們可以製造超光速燃料，但我們需要鈦鐵礦，而鈦鐵礦只能在某些小行星帶找到。

english: The nearest asteroid belt is in the next sector.
translation: 最近的小行星帶在下一個區域。

english: Travel to the asteroid belt and extract *X Tilium ore.
translation: 前往小行星帶，提取*X Tilium 礦石。

english: Then refine the mined ore in a Smelter.
translation: 然後在冶煉廠對開採出的礦石進行提煉。

english: Then drop the Ore off at any trading post to collect payment.
translation: 然後將礦石送到任何一個貿易站收款。

english: This contract requires a suitable mining vessel, equipped with Mining Lasers and Logistics Drones.
translation: 這份合同需要一艘合適的採礦船，配備採礦激光器和後勤無人機。

english: We've marked the asteroid belt location on your map.
translation: 我們已經在地圖上標出了小行星帶的位置。

english: You have *X Tilium ore on this ship (We need *Y)
translation: 您在這艘船上有*X Tilium 礦石（我們需要*Y)

english: Return to a colony or shipyard system to deliver the Tilium.
translation: 返回殖民地或造船廠系統，交付 Tilium。

english: We have received *X Tilium out of a total of *Y. Total payment due $*Z.
translation: 我們已收到*X Tilium，總金額爲*Y 。應支付的總金額爲$*Z 。

english: WARNING: There are reports of a meteor shower in that system. (+50% pay).
translation: 警告：有報告稱該星系出現流星雨。(報酬+50%）。

english: WARNING: There are hostile forces camped out near the asteroid belt. (+50% pay)
translation: 警告：小行星帶附近有敵軍駐紮。(+50%報酬）

english: "==> The Tilium must first be refined in a Smelter prior to delivery. <==
translation: "==> 在交付之前，必須先在熔煉爐中提煉鈦金。<==

english: We've dispatched a shuttle to collect the Tilium Ore.
translation: 我們已經派出一艘穿梭機去採集鈦礦石了。

english: There is no more Tilium on board your ship.
translation: 你的船上已經沒有提裏米了。

english: We have an urgent requirement for *X stacks of R*Y.
You can choose to manufacture the product from raw materials, or acquire it through some other means.
translation: 您可以選擇用原材料生產產品，也可以通過其他方式獲得產品。

english: The market price for these items would be $*X.
translation: 這些物品的市場價格爲$*X 。

english: (We are offering *X% above market rate due to urgent requirement).
translation: (由於需求緊急，我們提供比市場價高出*X% 的價格）。

english: You have *X stacks of R*Y available for transfer within your fleet (We need *Z)
translation: 您有 *X 堆 R*Y 可在艦隊內轉運（我們需要 *Z）

english: We have received *X stacks of R*Y out of a total of *Z.
translation: 我們已收到*X 堆棧中的R*Y ，共*Z 。

english: There is no more R*X available within your fleet.
SECTOR OBJECTIVE: Destroy all hostile forces
translation: 地區目標：消滅所有敵對勢力
將*X 從*Y 系統中清除

english: Hostile forces have taken up residence within this sector. They are hindering our evacuation efforts and stealing vital resources.
translation: 敵對勢力已經在這一區域佔據了一席之地。他們阻礙了我們的撤離工作，並竊取了重要資源。

english: We want you to pay a visit to each location marked HOSTILES on the map.
translation: 我們希望您訪問地圖上標有 HOSTILES 的每個地點。

english: Terminate any enemy vessels you find at those locations.
translation: 終結在這些地點發現的任何敵艦。

english: A payment of $*X will be made after each location is cleared, for a total of $*Y.
translation: 每個地點結算後，將支付$*X ，總計$*Y 。

english: SECTOR OBJECTIVE: Rescue civilians from wrecked ship
translation: 星區目標：從失事船隻中營救平民

english: NB. YOU WILL NEED AT LEAST FOUR THRUSTERS TO MANOEUVRE INTO POSITION.
translation: 注意：您至少需要四個推進器才能操縱到位。

english: The ship engines will explode very soon. (+25% pay).
translation: 飛船引擎很快就會爆炸。(+25% 報酬）。

english: There are reports of a meteor shower in the area. (+25% pay).
translation: 有報告稱該地區將出現流星雨。(+25%報酬）。

english: The ship is moving - you will need some skill to dock safely. (+25% pay)
translation: 船在移動--你需要一些技巧才能安全靠岸。(+25% 報酬）

english: The ship is spinning out of control. It will be very challenging to dock. (+25% pay)
translation: 這艘船正在失控。靠岸將非常具有挑戰性。(+25% 報酬）

english: There are hostile forces in the area. (+50% pay)
translation: 該地區有敵對勢力。(+50% 報酬）

english: You will require four manoeuvring thrusters to successfully dock with the damaged ship.
translation: 您需要四個機動推進器才能成功與受損的飛船對接。

english: We've marked the location of the wrecked ship on your map. Please hurry!
translation: 我們已經在地圖上標出了失事船隻的位置。請抓緊時間

english: *X crew out of *Y have been rescued and are on board.
All crew have been rescued from the ship! Drop them off at the nearest starbase or colony.
translation: 所有船員都已從飛船上獲救！將他們送到最近的星際基地或殖民地。

english: *X crew out of *Y have made it to safety. Payment owed $*Z.
translation: *X *Y 中的人員已安全抵達。欠款 。$*Z

english: The ship engine core will explode in just *X seconds!!
translation: 飛船引擎核心將在*X 秒內爆炸！
星區目標：疏散受困平民

english: There are *X civilians stranded in the sector, with no means to escape the coming catastrophe.
translation: 有*X 名平民被困在這一區域，無法逃離即將到來的災難。

english: Travel to their star systems and pick them up, and house them temporarily in your fleet.
translation: 前往他們的星系，把他們接來，暫時安置在你的艦隊中。

english: Transport them safely to the next sector and drop them off at the first starbase to complete the objective.
translation: 將他們安全運送到下一個區域，然後將他們送到第一個星際基地，完成目標。

english: Your ship will need enough free cabins in your habitation deck.
translation: 您的飛船需要在居住甲板上有足夠的空閒艙室。

english: (You can expand your hab deck at a Shipyard using the Ship Editor)
translation: (您可以使用艦船編輯器在船廠擴展您的居住甲板）

english: The total payment for rescuing all *X civilians will be $*Y
translation: 營救所有*X 平民的總費用爲$*Y

english: *X out of *Y civilians have been collected.
*X civilians have been killed during the evacuation.
translation: *X 平民在撤離過程中喪生。

english: *X passengers out of *Y have made it safely to their destination. Total payment $*Z.
translation: *X *Y 的乘客已安全抵達目的地。付款總額 。$*Z

english: *X passengers did not arrive at the destination safely.
translation: *X 乘客沒有安全抵達目的地。

english: Thank you for your efforts commander.
We need more data so we can understand what this anomaly is.
translation: 我們需要更多的數據，以便了解這種異常現象是什麼。

english: And we can't possibly stop the anomaly until we understand it.
translation: 在瞭解異常點之前，我們不可能阻止它。

english: If you can gather enough science data for us, we think there's a good chance we can design a way to counteract the anomaly.
translation: 如果你能爲我們收集到足夠的科學數據，我們認爲很有可能設計出一種方法來對抗異常點。

english: We've designed a custom sensor package that will give us the information we need.
translation: 我們設計了一套定製傳感器，可以提供我們需要的信息。

english: A shuttle is on its way now with two of these sensors.
translation: 現在，一架載有兩個這種傳感器的穿梭機已經在路上了。

english: Both sensors are on board your ship. You need to install them.
translation: 兩個傳感器都在您的飛船上。您需要安裝它們。

english: Install the sensors on your ship (*X/2)
Ensure the sensors are powered and operational
translation: 確保傳感器通電並正常工作

english: These sensors will collect data from the anomaly while you are in Hyperspace.
translation: 當您在超空間時，這些傳感器將收集異常點的數據。

english: The closer you can hyperjump to the anomaly, the faster they will collect data.
translation: 您超空間跳躍到離異常點越近的地方，它們收集數據的速度就越快。

english: You have captured *X Data from the anomaly.
translation: 您已經從異常點獲取了 *X 數據。
捕獲 *X 數據。資金獎勵 $*Y。
下一個獎勵需捕獲 *X 數據：$*Y。

english: We can send you research funding as you collect data. Capture 10 data from the Anomaly and we'll send the first funding grant.
translation: 我們可以在您收集數據的同時向您發送研究資金。從異常點獲取 10 個數據，我們就會發送第一筆資助。

english: We've received your preliminary sensor data. Fascinating! It looks like the anomaly is expanding, and the rate of expansion is increasing.
translation: 我們收到了您的初步傳感器數據。很有意思！看起來異常點正在擴大，而且擴大的速度越來越快。

english: We've just paid you a science grant of $10,000. Capture 100 data to unlock more funding. The closer you fly to the anomaly, the faster the sensors collect data.
translation: 我們剛剛向您支付了 10,000 美元的科學補助金。捕獲 100 個數據就能獲得更多資助。您飛得離異常點越近，傳感器收集數據的速度就越快。

english: We've now received 100 science packets from your sensors, thank you. This is invaluable data for us.
translation: 我們已經從你們的傳感器上收到了100個科學數據包，謝謝你們。這對我們來說是非常寶貴的數據

english: We've just sent you another $100,000.  The next bonus will be $1 Million for 1000 sensor data.  You can buy more hyperspace sensors at starbases and colonies.
translation: 我們剛剛又給你發了 10 萬美元。  下一筆獎金是 1000 個傳感器數據的 100 萬美元。  你可以在星際基地和殖民地購買更多的超空間傳感器。

english: Your sensors have now captured 1000 data from the anomaly. We have our best minds working on a solution and your data has been invaluable.
translation: 你們的傳感器已經從異常點獲取了 1000 個數據。我們已經動用了最優秀的人才來研究解決方案，你們的數據非常寶貴。

english: We're sending a $1M science grant to you now.  Keep doing what you're doing! More funding will be unlocked at 10,000 science data.
translation: 我們現在就把 100 萬美元的科學基金髮給你。  繼續做你正在做的事情！更多資金將在 10,000 個科學數據時解鎖。
收到 10,000 份科學數據。支付 1000 萬美元。
下一個獎勵爲 100,000 個科學數據

english: Some of our scientists don't believe the void collapse can ever be stopped.
translation: 我們的一些科學家不相信虛空坍塌會被阻止。

english: If that's true then billions of people are going to need evacuation from our home planets.
translation: 如果這是真的，那麼數十億人將需要從我們的母星撤離。

english: There has never been an evacuation of so many people at once.
translation: 從來沒有一次能同時疏散這麼多人。

english: And we don't even know where we can go that will be safe.
translation: 我們甚至不知道去哪裏才安全。

english: Every colonised planet you visit will have civilians in need of evacuation.
translation: 你訪問的每個殖民星球上都會有需要撤離的平民。

english: You will need to expand your habitation deck and even upgrade to a larger ship eventually.
translation: 您需要擴大居住甲板，甚至最終升級到更大的飛船。

english: You have evacuated *X civilians from doomed home worlds.
translation: 您已將*X 平民從註定毀滅的母星撤離。
撤離*X 平民。資金獎勵$*Y 。

english: Next bonus upon evacuation of *X civilians : $*Y.
translation: *X 平民撤離後的下一個獎勵：$*Y 。

english: It's possible we won't ever be able to stop the void collapse anomaly.
translation: 我們有可能永遠無法阻止虛空坍塌異常現象。

english: It may just keep expanding forever. There may be nowhere safe for us to stop.
translation: 它可能會一直擴張下去我們可能無處可停。

english: In which case we need to get used to living on self sufficient ships, indefinitely.
translation: 在這種情況下，我們需要習慣無限期地在自給自足的飛船上生活。

english: You will need to turn your ships into a long term self sufficient fleet.
translation: 您需要將您的戰艦變成一支長期自給自足的艦隊。

english: Bring as many people with you as you can, and don't look back.
translation: 帶儘可能多的人一起去，不要回頭。

english: Your highest population was *X residents within your fleet.
translation: 你的艦隊中人口最多的是*X 居民。

english: Population has reached *X residents. Funding bonus $*Y.
translation: 人口已達到*X 居民。資金獎勵$*Y 。

english: Next bonus when population reaches *X residents - $*Y.
translation: 當人口達到*X 居民時的下一個獎勵 -$*Y 。

english: Pumps oxygen into the surrounding cabin until a breathable atmosphere is achieved. Must be supplied with Oxygen through a pipe.
translation: 將氧氣泵入周圍的艙室，直至達到可呼吸的環境。必須通過管道供應氧氣。

english: Stores any excess power available in the powergrid, up to 1000Mw. The battery will supply power whenever there is a shortage.
translation: 可儲存電網中多餘的電力，最高可達 1000 兆瓦。每當電力短缺時，電池就會供電。

english: A box of ammo for a Gatling Gun (PDC).
translation: 一盒加特林機槍（PDC）的彈藥。

english: A box of ammo for a Railgun.
Provides an access point to the ship so that shuttle craft can dock and undock.
translation: 爲飛船提供一個出入口，以便穿梭機停靠和卸載。

english: A heavy pressure door that can be used to seal off areas in the event of a hull breach or fire.
translation: 重壓門，可在船體破裂或起火時用於封鎖區域。

english: A massive tank that can store a great deal of liquid or gas.
translation: 一個巨大的罐子，可以儲存大量的液體或氣體。

english: A storage tank that can store liquids and gases.
translation: 可儲存液體和氣體的儲罐。

english: A storage tank that can store liquids and gases.
translation: 可儲存液體和氣體的儲罐。

english: This equipment is required to launch Logistics Drones from your ship. Drones can gather resources and salvage from space, then bring it back to the ship through the Drone Bay. One Drone Bay can launch multiple Drones.
translation: 從飛船上發射後勤無人機需要這種設備。無人機可以從太空中收集資源和打撈物，然後通過無人機艙將其帶回飛船。一個無人機艙可以發射多架無人機。

english: Maneuvering thruster. Must be attached to the wall of the ship. Provides thrust to permit lateral and rotational movement.
translation: 操縱推進器。必須安裝在船壁上。提供推力，允許橫向和旋轉運動。

english: Uses nuclear fusion of Deuterium to generate large amounts of energy. However the fusion reactor must be 'powered up' with a huge amount of energy before it will generate any power itself.\n\nGenerates a maximum power output of 500MW.
translation: 利用氘核聚變產生大量能量。但是，聚變反應堆必須先消耗大量能量進行“啓動”，然後才能自行發電。\n\n最大輸出功率爲 500 兆瓦。

english: A terminal where a Weapons Officer can control multiple weapons at the same time.
translation: 供武器官同時控制多種武器的終端。

english: A close range rapid-fire weapon system, primarily designed for defense against incoming fighters and ordnance.  The gatling gun excels at destroying fast-moving targets at close range, but lacks the punch to penetrate armoured targets.
translation: 一種近距離速射武器系統，主要用於防禦來襲的戰鬥機和彈藥。加特林機槍擅長在近距離摧毀快速移動的目標，但缺乏穿透裝甲目標的威力。

english: A medium range weapon system that launches a barrage of explosive shells at the target. Cannon shells are excellent at dealing area-of-effect damage to an enemy ship, and will shred hull armour.
translation: 一種中程武器系統，可向目標發射一連串爆炸性炮彈。加農炮炮彈能對敵艦造成極佳的範圍傷害，並能撕碎船體裝甲。

english: Can drill into mineral patches (found in asteroid belts) to extract valuable minerals.
translation: 可鑽入礦脈（發現於小行星帶）以提取有價值的礦物。

english: A defensive system that uses a deflector beam to divert incoming rocket shells
translation: 利用偏轉光束轉移來襲火箭彈的防禦系統。

english: This is a general purpose version of the Fuel Loader and Oxygen Loader, and can take any liquid or gas canister.  Known to heavily confuse new captains.  Use pipes to connect the Loader to other equipment.
translation: 這是燃料裝載器和氧氣裝載器的通用版本，可以接收任何液體或氣體罐。衆所周知，這會讓新任艦長感到非常困惑。使用管道將裝載器與其他設備連接起來。

english: Takes a canister of Fuel, and pumps it into an underfloor pipe. Use pipes to connect this to your Reactor and your Engines.
translation: 接收燃料罐，並將其泵入地板下的管道。使用管道將其連接到反應堆和引擎。

english: Takes a pressurised canister of oxygen and pumps it into an underfloor pipe.  Use pipes to connect this to your Airduct, to supply oxygen to the cabin.
translation: 接收加壓氧氣罐，並將其泵入地板下的管道。使用管道將其連接到通風管道，爲機艙提供氧氣。

english: An incredibly useful semi-intelligent robot, capable of gathering salvage from deep space. Can also perform minor repairs to a damaged hull. Must be launched from a Drone Bay.
translation: 一種非常有用的半智能機器人，能夠從深空收集打撈物。它還能對損壞的船體進行小修。必須從無人機艙發射。

english: An extremely accurate and long range weapon system that fires a solid slug of metal. The Railgun is a precise weapon that can penetrate through hull armour and destroy equipment inside the target ship. However, the weapon draws a huge amount of energy to recharge after each shot.
translation: 一種極其精準的遠程武器系統，可發射固體金屬彈頭。軌道炮是一種精確的武器，可以穿透船體裝甲，摧毀目標飛船內的設備。不過，這種武器每次發射後都需要消耗大量能量來充電。

english: Burns high-energy Fuel to produce power. Must be supplied with Fuel (via a pipe). Then use cables to connect to other powered equipment.\nGenerates a maximum power output of 100MW.
translation: 燃燒高能燃料以產生動力。必須通過管道供應燃料。然後使用電纜連接到其他供電設備。\n最大輸出功率爲 100 兆瓦。

english: A workstation for a scientist to conduct valuable research.
translation: 供科學家進行有價值研究的工作站。

english: A powerful computer for number crunching and simulating important research.
translation: 用於數據運算和模擬重要研究的強大計算機。

english: A storage place for spacesuits that need their oxygen replenishing.
translation: 存放宇航服併爲其補充氧氣的地方。

english: Crew and passengers can only access the upper habitation deck with a ladder.
translation: 船員和乘客只能通過梯子進入上層居住甲板。

english: A Long Range and extremely sensitive prototype version of the standard hyperspace sensor.
translation: 標準超空間傳感器的遠程且極高靈敏度的原型版本。

english: A sensor capable of detecting telepathic waves.
translation: 能夠探測心靈感應波的傳感器。

english: The local shipyard can repair the heavy structural damage on your ship, for a price.
translation: 當地造船廠可修復您飛船的嚴重結構性損壞，需付費。

english: A small bag of mixed vegetable seeds, that you might be able to grow in a Hydroponic Garden.
translation: 一小袋混合蔬菜種子，您可以在水培花園中種植。

english: This industrial processing machine can melt ores into usable metal ingots. Once installed, click on it to change the ore type.
translation: 此工業加工機器可將礦石熔鍊成可用的金屬錠。安裝後，點擊它以更改礦石類型。

english: This pipe extracts sewage from the habitation deck above. You can then pipe the sewage into a storage tank and (eventually) reprocess it back into water.  The Pipe MUST BE DIRECTLY UNDER THE HABITATION DECK to function.
translation: 此管道從上方的居住甲板抽取污水。然後，您可以用管道將污水輸送到儲水箱中，並（最終）將其重新處理成水。此管道必須直接位於居住甲板下方方可生效。

english: Takes sewage from the habitation deck, separates the solid and liquid waste, and partially recycles them. The device outputs dirty water and compost.
translation: 接收來自居住甲板的污水，分離固體和液體廢物，並對其進行部分回收利用。該裝置輸出髒水和堆肥。

english: Takes dirty water from sewage recycling or from naturally occurring ice - and purifies it into safe drinkable water.
translation: 接收來自污水回收或天然冰塊的髒水，並將其淨化爲安全的飲用水。

english: Uses electrical power to extract Oxygen from Water.
translation: 消耗電力從水中提取氧氣。

english: Extracts Carbon Dioxide from the atmosphere. Its output must be piped into a storage tank or it will become blocked.
translation: 從大氣中提取二氧化碳。其輸出必須通過管道輸送至儲罐，否則會發生堵塞。
將二氧化碳轉化爲可呼吸的氧氣。

english: Grinds giant lumps of ice into small pieces, then warms the ice until it melts into liquid. The resulting water must be filtered before it is safe to drink.
translation: 將巨大的冰塊研磨成碎塊，然後加熱直至融化成液體。由此產生的水必須經過過濾才能安全飲用。

english: A large exterior vent that sucks in gases from space. Many gases found in nebulas can be used to produce useful resources like Fuel, FTL charges, and explosives.
translation: 一種大型外部通風口，可從太空中吸入氣體。星雲中的許多氣體都可以用來生產有用的資源，如燃料、超光速燃料單元和炸藥。

english: An automatic industrial machine for refining raw chemicals and gases.
translation: 用於提煉化學原料和氣體的自動工業機器。

english: A complex piece of scientific equipment.  Can combine multiple different chemical inputs (liquids, gases and solids) into different outputs. The user can cycle the active 'recipe' by clicking on it.
translation: 一種複雜的科學設備。可以將多種不同的化學輸入（液體、氣體和固體）組合成不同的輸出。用戶可以通過點擊來循環切換激活的“配方”。

english: The Hyperspace Scoop sits at the front of a starship and faces the direction of travel. During hyperspace a strong magnetic field is projected forward, drawing in large volumes of interstellar matter. The isotopes gathered this way can be refined into FTL Fuel.
translation: 超空間採集器位於星艦前部，面向航行方向。在超空間中，強大的磁場會向前投射，吸引大量星際物質。通過這種方式收集的同位素可以提煉成超光速燃料。

english: A workbench where a skilled crew member can fabricate different forms of ammunition for ship weapon systems. Uses metal and explosives to produce Bullets, Railgun Slugs, Cannon Shells etc.
translation: 一種工作臺，技術熟練的船員可以在這裏爲飛船武器系統製造不同形式的彈藥。使用金屬和炸藥製造子彈、軌道炮彈頭和炮彈等。

english: An enclosed greenhouse device that can be used to grow crops, in order to feed your crew.  Requires compost and water, and Seeds to get things started.
translation: 一種封閉式溫室裝置，可以用來種植作物，爲你的船員提供食物。需要堆肥、水和種子來啓動。

english: These must be installed outside your ship, with scaffolding for support. Each panel generates 10MW.
translation: 必須安裝在飛船外部，並有腳手架作爲支撐。每塊電池板的發電量爲 10 兆瓦。

english: Broken hop drive, capable of hopping within systems
translation: 損壞的跳躍驅動器，可在星系內進行跳躍

english: Storage crate, stores a single type of resource but at 4x the usual amount per square
translation: 儲物箱，僅存儲單一類型的資源，但每格存儲量是通常的 4 倍

english: Small storage crate, stores a single type of resource but at 4x the usual amount per square
translation: 小型儲物箱，僅存儲單一類型的資源，但每格存儲量是通常的 4 倍

english: It is the 23rd century.  Humanity has colonised the stars.
translation: 現在是 23 世紀。  人類已在羣星間建立殖民地。

english: Millions of people now live off world, sometimes hundreds of light years from Earth.
translation: 如今，數百萬人類生活在地球之外，有些甚至距離地球數百光年。

english: Word has reached Earth from one such colony. A dark anomaly has been seen, and cannot be explained.
translation: 地球收到來自其中一個殖民地的消息。那裏發現了一種無法解釋的黑暗異常現象。

english: Where once there was a star, now there is nothing but a black void, slowly expanding.
translation: 曾經的恆星所在地，如今只剩下一片黑色的虛空，且正在緩慢擴張。

english: Those who live nearby call it THE COLLAPSE, and believe it will eventually consume the entire galaxy.
translation: 附近的居民稱其爲“大崩塌”，並相信它最終將吞噬整個銀河系。

english: There are few who believe them.
Nevertheless, Earth has dispatched you and your crew in the science vessel PRAXIS to investigate.
translation: 儘管如此，地球方面還是派遣了你和你的船員，駕駛“實踐號”科考船前往調查。

english: Make your new ship ready for flight
translation: 讓您的新飛船做好飛行準備

english: All ships must pass basic flight ready certification before being allowed on operations.
translation: 所有船隻必須通過基本飛行準備認證，纔可投入運營。

english: A ship requires each of the following capabilities in order to be certified 'Flight Ready':
translation: 要獲得 "飛行就緒 "認證，飛船必須具備以下各項能力：

english: A reactor to generate power. Use a Fuel Loader to pipe fuel into the Reactor.
translation: 一個用於發電的反應堆。使用燃料裝載器將燃料輸送到反應堆。

english: Engines for propulsion.  Test fire your engines (From the TACTICAL view) to certify them.
translation: 用於推進的發動機。  試射發動機（從戰術視角），對其進行認證。

english: Life support to make the cabin breathable.  Use an Airduct to pressurise the cabin, connected to an Oxygen Loader to supply the air.
translation: 生命支持，使機艙可以呼吸。  使用空氣導管給機艙加壓，並連接氧氣裝載器來提供空氣。

english: An FTL Drive.  Test your new FTL engine by making a jump to the destination marked on the map.
translation: 超光速駕駛  跳轉到地圖上標記的目的地，測試你的新超光速引擎。

english: Test the engines from the TACTICAL screen
Life support to make the interior habitable [*X%]
translation: 使內部適宜居住的生命支持系統 [*X%]

english: An FTL Drive capable of Hyperspace jumps
translation: 能進行超空間跳躍的超光速驅動器

english: Prepare your ship and crew for the upcoming battle!\nUnpausing the game will begin combat.
translation: 爲即將到來的戰鬥準備好您的飛船和船員！\n取消暫停遊戲將開始戰鬥。

english: OPTIONAL: Use the ship editor to prepare
translation: 可選： 使用飛船編輯器準備

english: It is the 23rd century.  Humanity has colonised the stars.
translation: 現在是 23 世紀。  人類已在羣星間建立殖民地。

english: Millions of people now live off world, sometimes hundreds of light years from Earth.
translation: 如今，數百萬人類生活在地球之外，有些甚至距離地球數百光年。

english: Word has reached Earth from a distant science station. A dark anomaly has been detected, and cannot be explained.
translation: 地球收到來自遙遠科學站的消息。那裏檢測到一種無法解釋的黑暗異常現象。

english: Where once there was a star, now there is nothing but a black void, endlessly expanding and consuming everything in its path.
translation: 曾經的恆星所在地，如今只剩下一片黑色的虛空，無休止地擴張着，吞噬沿途的一切。

english: Scientists believe it will eventually consume the entire galaxy.
translation: 科學家認爲，它最終將吞噬整個銀河系。

english: There is only one glimmer of hope. A STARGATE project, unfinished and unproven, offers an escape route to a distant Galaxy.
translation: 僅存一線希望。一個未完成且未經測試的星際之門項目，提供了一條通往遙遠星系的逃生之路。

english: But the scale of the catastrophe is almost too big to comprehend. Only a few will survive.
translation: 但這場災難的規模幾乎超乎想象。只有極少數人能倖存。

english: With a new ship and a new crew, you commit yourself to reaching the STARGATE with as many people as you can, before it's too late.
translation: 駕駛着新的飛船，帶領着新的船員，你決心在爲時已晚之前，儘可能多地將人們送往星際之門。

english: We need a transport vessel to ferry a litter of lovable, rare live animals to a sanctuary, many jumps away.
translation: 我們需要一艘運輸船，將一窩可愛的珍稀活體動物運往遠在千里之外的避難所。

english: The animals aren't dangerous, but they do have some special requirements that must be closely followed or they will not survive the journey.
translation: 這些動物並不危險，但它們有一些特殊的要求，必須嚴格遵守，否則就無法在旅途中存活下來。

english: We will pay $*X if the entire litter is delivered safely.
translation: 如果整窩嬰兒安全送達，我們將支付$*X 。

english: Excellent. We are sending a shuttle to you now.
translation: 好極了我們現在就派穿梭機過去

english: Thank you very much for helping us with these unique creatures. If I'm honest, we have struggled to find a captain who was willing to undertake this mission.
translation: 非常感謝你幫助我們找到這些獨特的生物。老實說，我們一直在努力尋找願意承擔這項任務的艦長。

english: We have left you with a litter of eight female Tiddlets, along with some comfortable crates for them to sleep in.
translation: 我們給你們留下了一窩八隻雌性 Tiddlets，還有一些舒適的箱子供它們睡覺。

english: Please take very good care of them!
We have delivered *X out of 8 Tiddlets.
translation: 在 8 個 Tiddlets 中，我們已經交付了*X 。
所有 8 臺 Tiddlets 均已交付。

english: Now, there is one crucial detail you must adhere to, in order to safely transport these Tiddlets.
translation: 現在，爲了安全運輸這些 Tiddlets，您必須遵守一個關鍵細節。

english: They can survive up to *X seconds in hyperspace safely, but anything beyond that risks them dying of shock.
translation: 它們在超空間中最多可以安全存活*X 秒，但超過這個時間，它們就有可能因休克而死亡。

english: Please be very careful when choosing your hyperspace route.
translation: 在選擇超空間路線時，請務必小心謹慎。

english: There are now *X dead tiddlets on board
translation: 現在，船上有*X 個死掉的 Tiddlets

english: Oh my goodness! We were certain all 8 were female, but clearly we made a mistake.
translation: 我的天啊我們確定這 8 只都是母的，但顯然我們搞錯了。

english: We would suggest you separate them, but tiddlets reproduce telepathically, and only ever during hyperspace travel.
translation: 我們建議你把它們分開，但蝶形蟲是通過心靈感應繁殖的，而且只能在超空間旅行時繁殖。

english: Oh my goodness!! There are so many of them!
We have safely received *X out of 8 Tiddlets - Payment due $*Y
translation: 我們已安全收到*X 的 8 件 Tiddlets - 付款到期$*Y

english: We have now received an additional *X Tiddlets!
translation: 我們現在又收到了*X Tiddlets！

english: We have received all of your Tiddlets. Thank you so much!
translation: 我們已經收到了你們所有的 Tiddlets。非常感謝！

english: Since you delivered an entirely new litter to us, we thought it only fair to reward you with a gift.
translation: 既然您爲我們提供了全新的垃圾，我們認爲送您一份禮物是非常公平的。

english: We have sent you a couple of prototype Long Range Hyperspace Sensors. They are much more sensitive than the standard model. We hope you find them useful.
translation: 我們給你寄去了幾個超空間長距離傳感器的原型。它們比標準型號更加靈敏。希望對您有用。

english: But we trusted you to look after their safety. You've let us down.
translation: 但我們信任你，讓你照顧他們的安全。你讓我們失望了

english: What the hell happened? We trusted you with those Tiddlets and you let us down!
translation: 到底發生了什麼事？我們信任你，你卻讓我們失望了

english: Greetings! We are looking for a pilot who can help us with an important animal welfare matter.
translation: 您好！我們正在尋找一名能夠幫助我們處理一項重要動物福利事務的飛行員。

english: If you'd like to help (and earn a lot of credits) please find our job in the CONTRACTS list.
translation: 如果您想提供幫助（並獲得大量信用點），請在 "合同 "列表中找到我們的工作。

english: We are willing to pay a very generous price to any individual who can supply us with one or more Tiddlets.
translation: 如果有人能向我們提供一隻或更多的 Tiddlets，我們願意支付非常慷慨的價格。

english: If you have Tiddlets available then bring them to us and we will reward you handsomely.
translation: 如果您有可用的 Tiddlets，請把它們帶給我們，我們會給您豐厚的獎勵。

english: We won't ask any questions as to where they came from. But we will need every Tiddlet you have - so we can be sure there is at least one male among the litter.
translation: 我們不會詢問它們來自哪裏。但是我們需要您的每一隻 Tiddlet，這樣我們才能確保這窩 Tiddlet 中至少有一隻雄性。

english: We will pay $*X for every Tiddlet you have.
translation: 我們將爲您的每個 Tiddlet 支付$*X 。

english: We are offering you $*Y for all *X of your Tiddlets.
translation: 我們將爲您提供$*Y ，*X 您的 Tiddlets。

english: We have received *X Tiddlets. Total payment due $*Y.
translation: 我們已收到*X Tiddlets。應付款總額$*Y 。

english: Well, thank you very much. With this many Tiddlets we can begin farming these delicious creatures immediately.
translation: 非常感謝有了這麼多提德萊 我們就可以馬上開始養殖這些美味的生物了

english: We've heard a rumour you might have some rare, valuable life-forms on board.
translation: 我們聽說你的飛船上可能有一些稀有、珍貴的生命體。

english: Stop by your nearest Contract Board and we might be able to make a deal.
translation: 請到離您最近的合同委員會，我們也許能做成一筆交易。

english: There is a hole in your ship hull and the cabin is depressurising. Your crew will fix the breach, but you should consider closing your Door Vents to seal off the area.
translation: 您的船體上有一個洞，船艙正在減壓。您的船員會修復破洞，但您應該考慮關閉艙門通風口以封閉該區域。

english: There is a dangerous build up of CO2 inside your ship. If it reaches 100%, your crew will suffocate. Consider buying a CO2 Scrubber and connecting it to a storage tank.
translation: 您的飛船內正在積聚危險的二氧化碳。如果達到 100%，您的船員就會窒息。考慮購買一個二氧化碳洗滌器，並將其連接到一個儲氣罐。

english: Oxygen must be at 50% to be breathable.
translation: 氧氣含量必須達到 50%，纔可以呼吸。

english: Your batteries have been drained. It is likely your reactors are not creating enough power to meet the needs of your ship. You will need either more Reactors, or more battery storage, or both.
translation: 您的電池已經耗盡。您的反應堆可能無法產生足夠的能量來滿足飛船的需要。您需要更多的反應堆，或者更多的電池存儲，或者兩者兼而有之。

english: Your reactor has cut out. It is likely the fuel supply has been interrupted.  Consider using storage tanks to create a permanent store of fuel for your Reactor to draw from.
translation: 你的反應堆斷電了。很可能是燃料供應中斷了。  考慮使用儲存罐爲反應堆永久儲存燃料。

english: To submit completed parts to the stargate project, sell them at any trade outpost in the sector
translation: 要向星門計劃提交已完成的部件，請在該星區的任意貿易站出售這些部件。

english: It is the 23rd century.  Humanity has colonised the stars.
translation: 現在是 23 世紀。  人類已在羣星間建立殖民地。

english: Millions of people now live off world, sometimes hundreds of light years from Earth.
translation: 如今，數百萬人類生活在地球之外，有些甚至距離地球數百光年。

english: The era of massive industrialisation of space has begun, feeding an insatiable desire for energy and metal.
translation: 太空大規模工業化的時代已經開啓，以滿足對能源和金屬的無盡渴望。

english: Powerful businesses control vast swathes of space, backed by untold reserves of wealth.
translation: 強大的企業坐擁無法估量的財富，控制着廣袤的星域。

english: The CEO of one such company - the INTERSTELLAR MINING CORPORATION - has challenged humanity to build a stargate so powerful it can reach our nearest Galaxy.
translation: 其中一家公司——星際礦業公司（INTERSTELLAR MINING CORPORATION）——的首席執行官向全人類發起挑戰：建造一個足以抵達最近星系的星門。

english: Trillions of dollars in funding have been set aside.
translation: 數萬億美元的資金已準備就緒。

english: The time is perfect for a small entrepreneurial and industrious team of miners to start a new career - and make their fortune in the stars.
translation: 對於一支富有創業精神且勤勞肯幹的小型礦工團隊來說，現在正是開啓新事業——在羣星間發家致富的絕佳時機。

english: The ship has two factory fitted engines ready to go, but we need to connect them up.
translation: 飛船上有兩臺出廠時就安裝好的發動機，但我們需要將它們連接起來。

english: Let's start with the starboard engine. Use the pipes menu to run a pipe from the engine to your existing yellow fuel lines.
translation: 讓我們從右舷發動機開始。使用“管道”菜單將一根管道從發動機連接到現有的黃色燃油管道上。

english: Fantastic work! The Starboard engine is now starting up.
translation: 幹得漂亮！右舷發動機已經啓動。

english: Now repeat the process with the port engine. Connect the fuel and power lines to start the engine.
translation: 現在對左舷發動機重複上述過程。連接燃油和電源線，啓動發動機。

english: Both of our engines are now operational.
translation: 現在，我們的兩臺發動機都已投入使用。

english: A shuttle will deliver the items to us.
translation: 穿梭機會將物品送到我們這裏。

english: Your new crew will arrive by shuttle.
translation: 你的新船員將乘坐穿梭機抵達。

english: Your crew will now power up the ship and bring the engines and life support online.
translation: 現在，您的船員將爲飛船提供動力，啓動引擎和生命支持系統。

english: We have arrived at the destination system.
translation: 我們已經到達目的地星系。

english: A shuttle will be dispatched to collect the passengers.
translation: 屆時將有穿梭機接送乘客。

english: The passengers have all arrived safely. You will now be paid the fee and will also receive points toward your Humanitarian rating - giving you access to more difficult and lucrative missions.
translation: 乘客已全部安全抵達。現在，您將獲得酬金，同時還將獲得人道主義等級積分--讓您有機會執行難度更大、利潤更高的任務。

english: We've covered the basics. You've learnt how to install equipment on your ship, and how to navigate space.
translation: 我們已經介紹了基礎知識。你已經學會了如何在飛船上安裝設備，以及如何在太空中航行。

english: Keep a keen eye out for special systems on the map, you never know who or what you may find there.
translation: 密切留意地圖上的特殊系統，你永遠不知道在那裏會發現什麼人或什麼東西。

english: Whatever you choose, more instructions will be given when required.\n\nIt's up to you what you do next.
translation: 無論您選擇什麼，我們都會在需要時提供更多說明。\n\n接下來就看您怎麼做了。

english: Are you sure you wish to skip the tutorial?
We are now going to learn how to dock your ship to another ship.
translation: 現在我們來學習如何將飛船停靠在另一艘飛船上。

english: Use your main ship engines to get close to the *X.
Well done. You have docked successfully!
We are now going to learn how to transfer crew from one ship to another.\n\nThe two ships must be docked so that the crew can walk from one ship to another.
translation: 現在我們將學習如何將船員從一艘飛船轉移到另一艘飛船。\n\n兩艘飛船必須對接，以便船員可以在飛船之間走動。

english: First, switch back to normal view by leaving tactical mode.
translation: 首先，離開戰術模式切換回正常視圖。

english: Excellent. Now we just need to wait for the crew to transfer.
translation: 太好了。現在我們只需要等待船員轉移完成。

english: Well done. You have transferred some crew successfully!
translation: 幹得好你成功地轉移了一些船員！

english: We are now going to learn some basic combat techniques.
translation: 我們現在要學習一些基本的戰鬥技巧。

english: You can see the range of weapons by hovering over them. Weapons will shoot at enemy ships in their range.
translation: 將鼠標懸停在武器上，可以看到武器的射程。武器會向其射程內的敵艦射擊。

english: Target their weapon systems so that they can't damage you further.
translation: 瞄準他們的武器系統，讓他們無法進一步傷害你。

english: Well done. You have learned how to use weapons. Now fire at will at the pirate ship!
translation: 幹得好你們已經學會了如何使用武器。現在隨意向海盜船開火！

english: We are now going to learn how to mine and collect resources from asteroids.
translation: 我們現在要學習如何從小行星上開採和收集資源。

english: This system seems to have asteroids containing Tilium Ore, fly close to one of them.
translation: 這個星系似乎有蘊含鈦鐵礦的小行星，飛近其中一顆。

english: You can see the range of mining lasers by hovering over them. Mining lasers will fire at mineral patches in their field of fire.
translation: 將鼠標懸停在採礦激光器上方，就能看到它們的射程。採礦激光器會向其射程內的礦斑開火。

english: Target a Tilium Ore patch by clicking on one while having a mining laser selected.
translation: 在選中採礦激光器的同時，點擊一個鈦礦石補丁，瞄準該補丁。

english: Move your ship until the mineral patch is in the range of fire.
translation: 移動飛船，直到礦斑進入射擊範圍。

english: Perfect! Now wait for your smelter to smelt the Tilium Ore.
translation: 完美！現在就等着你的熔煉爐熔鍊鈦鐵礦吧。

english: We are now going to learn about selecting and buying ships.
translation: 現在，我們將學習如何選擇和購買船隻。

english: It is the 23rd century.  Humanity has colonised the stars.
translation: 現在是 23 世紀。  人類已在羣星間建立殖民地。

english: Millions now thrive on distant worlds, living hundreds of light years from Earth.
translation: 如今，數百萬人在距離地球數百光年的遙遠世界中繁衍生息。

english: As space becomes the new frontier, an era of unprecedented exploration and expansion unfolds.
translation: 隨着太空成爲新的邊疆，一個前所未有的探索與擴張時代正徐徐展開。

english: Powerful corporations dominate entire regions, but beyond their reach lies uncharted territory, filled with untold mysteries and boundless opportunities.
translation: 強大的企業主宰着整片星域，但在它們的勢力範圍之外，仍有未知的疆域，充滿了難以言喻的奧祕和無限的機遇。

english: The CEO of the INTERSTELLAR MINING CORPORATION has issued a daring challenge: build a stargate powerful enough to reach our nearest galaxy.
translation: 星際礦業公司（INTERSTELLAR MINING CORPORATION）的首席執行官發起了一項大膽的挑戰：建造一個足以抵達最近星系的星際之門。

english: With trillions in funding up for grabs, the stage is set for fearless adventurers to forge their own path in the cosmos.
translation: 數萬億資金虛位以待，爲無畏的冒險家在宇宙中開闢自己的道路搭建了舞臺。

english: Will you rise to the challenge, and chart your own course among the stars?
translation: 你是否願意迎接挑戰，在羣星間開闢屬於自己的航線？

english: Captain, I'm the chief of security for this sector, and I need your help.
translation: 艦長，我是這個星區的保安隊長，我需要你的幫助。

english: All across the sector, there are people in trouble who need our assistance.
translation: 在整個星區，都有陷入困境的人需要我們的幫助。

english: I'm spread too thin. I can't be everywhere. You're more than capable, and I'll be there to offer advice when I can.
translation: 我太分散了。我不可能無處不在你有足夠的能力，我會盡我所能提供建議。

english: If you chose to help, I've marked the locations on your map, as GOLD HIGHLIGHTS.
translation: 如果您選擇提供幫助，我已在您的地圖上將這些地點標記爲 "金色亮點"。

english: My name is Commander Harken, and I'm the Chief of Private Security for the sector.
translation: 我叫哈肯指揮官，是區裏的私人保安隊長。

english: We've recieved reports of a shipwreck nearby. I believe it to be the wreckage of THE INTERSTELLAR PROSPECTOR - a large commercial vessel that went missing yesterday.
translation: 我們收到報告說附近有沉船殘骸我相信那是昨天失蹤的大型商船 "星際探測器 "號的殘骸。

english: Travel to the shipwreck and look for a Black Box Flight Recorder in the wreckage.  This device will contain a log of their final moments.
translation: 前往沉船，在殘骸中尋找黑匣子飛行記錄器。  這個裝置將記錄他們最後的時刻。

english: To collect the flight recorder you'll need to install a DRONE BAY and at least one LOGISTICS DRONE. You can buy them from any Shipyard or Colony.
translation: 要收集飛行記錄器，您需要安裝一個無人機艙和至少一架貨運無人機。您可以從任何船廠或殖民地購買。

english: My name is Commander Harken, and I'm the Chief of Private Security for the sector.
translation: 我叫哈肯指揮官，是區裏的私人保安隊長。

english: You have found the remains of the Interstellar Prospector. Please bring its Black Box Flight Recorder to me, and I will explain more.
translation: 你們發現了星際探礦者號的殘骸。請把它的黑匣子飛行記錄器拿給我，我會給你更多解釋。

english: In order to collect the Flight Recorder you will need Drones, launched from a Drone Bay on your ship.  If you don't already have this equipment, you'll need to buy at least one DRONE BAY, and at least one LOGISTICS DRONE, from any colony or shipyard.
translation: 爲了收集飛行記錄器，您需要從飛船上的無人機艙發射無人機。  如果您還沒有這些設備，您需要從任何殖民地或造船廠購買至少一個無人機艙和至少一架貨運無人機。

english: Thank you for returning the flight recorder, Captain.
translation: 謝謝你歸還飛行記錄器，艦長

english: We are in the grip of a major crisis.  Commercial vessels laden with valuable cargo are being targeted and destroyed.  These vessels are under our protection - but often lack any serious defenses, and barely have a chance to send out a distress call before they are plundered.  This is a calculated assault on the free market trade and industry within this sector, and cannot be allowed to continue.
translation: 我們正處於一場重大危機之中。  滿載貴重貨物的商船正成爲襲擊和摧毀的目標。  這些船隻受到我們的保護，但往往缺乏有效的防禦措施，幾乎連發出求救信號的機會都沒有，就被掠奪一空。  這是對這一地區自由市場貿易和工業的蓄意攻擊，不能再任其發展下去了。

english: I'm sending you the coordinates of two more stricken vessels, pinpointing their last known locations before they went dark.  We need you to travel to the wreckage of each of these ships, and collect whatever evidence you can.
translation: 我把另外兩艘遇難船隻的座標發給你 它們在消失前的最後位置都已確定  我們需要你前往這兩艘船的殘骸處 儘可能收集證據

english: The primary objective is the safe recovery of their Black Box Flight Recorders, which will contain a log of their final moments.
translation: 首要目標是安全找回他們的黑匣子飛行記錄儀，其中將記錄他們最後的時刻。

english: Here are the co-ordinates of the two shipwrecks we need you to visit.
translation: 下面是我們需要你們去探訪的兩艘沉船的座標。

english: The fourth vessel to be targeted managed to send out a distress call. Local security forces responded too late, and found nothing but the destroyed fuselage with a presumed loss of all crew.
translation: 第四艘被擊中的船隻設法發出了求救信號。當地安全部隊的反應爲時已晚，只發現了被摧毀的機身，推測所有機組人員都已遇難。

english: This is the only image they managed to send, before their transmission went dead.
translation: 這是他們在傳輸中斷前成功發送的唯一圖像。

english: The wreckage - which is the forensic evidence of their fate - was collected and taken back to System S*X, where it's currently sitting in storage.  We need you to send a ship to collect the wreckage, and bring it to us along with the recovered black box modules.
translation: 這些殘骸是他們命運的法醫證據，已被收集並運回S*X 系統，目前被存放在那裏。  我們需要你們派遣一艘飛船去收集殘骸，並將其與回收的黑匣子模塊一起交給我們。

english: Bring all the recovered wreckage and the black box flight recorders back to me for analysis on board my ship The Vanguard, to complete the contract.
translation: 把所有打撈上來的殘骸和黑匣子飛行記錄器帶回我的先鋒號上進行分析，以完成合同。

english: Install a Drone Bay and at least one Logistics Drone
translation: 安裝無人機艙和至少一架貨運無人機

english: Recover Flight Recorder from UMC Interstellar Prospector
translation: 從 UMC 星際勘探者號上回收飛行記錄器

english: Recover Flight Recorder from UMC Infinite Horizon
translation: 從聯電無限地平線恢復飛行記錄器

english: Recover Flight Recorder from UMC Celestial Hauler
translation: 從 UMC Celestial Hauler 上回收飛行記錄器

english: Collect the wreckage of UMC Stellar Horizon from System S*X [*Y/*Z]
translation: 從系統S*X [*Y/*Z] 收集聯電恆星地平線號的殘骸。

english: Return the Flight Recorder to Commander Harken
translation: 將飛行記錄器還給哈肯指揮官

english: Return the Flight Recorders to Commander Harken [*Y/*Z]
translation: 將飛行記錄器歸還哈肯指揮官 [*Y/*Z]

english: Return the Wreckage to Commander Harken [*Y/*Z]
translation: 將殘骸歸還哈肯指揮官 [*Y/*Z]

english: You've delivered *X/*Y of the Ship Wreckage
You've delivered *X/*Y of the Flight Recorders
translation: 您已交付*X/*Y 飛行記錄器

english: Got my hands on something you might be looking for.  A recording of the screams and static from the ship's final moments.  You want it, I know it.  Scavengers rights says it's mine.
translation: 我手上有你可能在找的東西。飛船最後時刻的尖叫和靜電記錄。你想要，我知道。根據拾荒法則，這是我的。

english: Luckily for you, you can have your precious data, so long as I get my finders fee.  It'll cost you $*X for the secrets.  Cross me and it will be the last mistake you make.
translation: 幸運的是，你可以得到你的珍貴資料 只要我拿到我的 "發現費"。  你得花$*X 才能得到這些祕密  跟我作對，這將是你犯下的最後一個錯誤。

english: We'll drop your Flight Recorder out the cargo hold and be on our way.
translation: 我們會把你的飛行記錄器從貨艙扔出去，然後上路。

english: Recover the Flight Recorder from Scavenger Vessel
translation: 從清道夫飛船上奪回飛行記錄儀

english: Once you've collected all the Ship Wreckage, bring it to me along with the Flight Recorders. I'm onboard The Vanguard - sending our location now.
translation: 一旦你們收集了所有的船隻殘骸，就把它們和飛行記錄器一起交給我。我在先鋒號上，現在發送我們的位置。

english: You've recovered the flight recorder! Bring it to me. I'm onboard The Vanguard - sending our location now.
translation: 你找到了飛行記錄器拿給我我在先鋒號上 正在發送我們的位置

english: The flight recorder should be near the derelict L*X. Move towards it so that your drones can pick it up.
translation: 飛行記錄器應該在廢棄的L*X 附近。朝它移動，這樣無人機就能捕捉到它。

english: Your ship will need a drone bay and drones to collect the flight recorder.
translation: 您的飛船需要一個無人機艙和無人機來收集飛行記錄器。

english: We've analysed the black box recordings and the evidence is already pretty clear.  There's a pirate vessel out there somewhere, preying on high value commercial vessels.  They wait in silence, until the ship is alone, isolated, and defenseless.  They come out of nowhere and attack without warning, and before anybody can respond they've destroyed the ship and looted the cargo.
translation: 我們已經分析了黑匣子的記錄 證據已經非常明顯了  在某處有一艘海盜船 專門襲擊高價值的商船  他們悄無聲息地等待，直到船隻孤立無援，毫無防備。  他們突然出現，毫無徵兆地發動攻擊，在所有人反應過來之前，他們已經摧毀了船隻，搶走了貨物。

english: Most likely to be sold for vast profits to the Stargate Project - who don't seem keen to ask questions.
translation: 很有可能被賣給星際之門項目，獲得鉅額利潤--他們似乎並不熱衷於提問。

english: So far they haven't left a single living witness. But the sensor data tells the full story. We've manged to extract another sensor image of the attacker.
translation: 到目前爲止，它們還沒有留下一個活着的目擊者。但傳感器數據說明了一切我們設法提取了另一張攻擊者的傳感器圖像

english: It's another grainy photograph, but it's all we have to go on.  This is without doubt the vessel responsible for all this death and destruction.
translation: 這又是一張模糊不清的照片，但我們只能根據它來判斷。  毫無疑問，這就是造成這些死亡和破壞的船隻。

english: In the mean time, we suggest you tend to your ships. If you've taken damage, you can repair the hull at any SHIPYARD. Use the funds we've sent to upgrade your defenses.
translation: 在此期間，我們建議您照料好您的船隻。如果你們的戰艦受損，可以在任何一個船塢修理船體。用我們送來的資金升級你們的防禦系統。

english: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing, Part 2
translation: 披着羊皮的狼，第二部分

english: Captain. We're ready to continue our hunt for the pirate vessel. Please meet me at the marked location.
translation: 艦長我們準備好繼續追捕海盜船了請在標記地點與我會合

english: We have been attempting to track the pirate vessel down, but to no avail. We keep arriving at the scene to find destroyed ships with no trace of the pirates. We need you to-
translation: 我們一直試圖追蹤這艘海盜船，但毫無結果。我們不斷趕到現場，發現船隻已被摧毀，卻找不到海盜的蹤跡。我們需要你們

english: This is Captain Amelia Ryker of the UMC vessel Orion Sentinel.  We are under attack!  They appeared out of nowhere and fired on us without warning, and won't respond to any of my communications.
translation: 我是UMC獵戶座哨兵號的艾米莉亞-雷克艦長  我們遭到了攻擊  他們突然出現，毫無徵兆地向我們開火，而且不回應我的任何通訊。

english: I'm trying to hold them off, but I need help.  My engines are damaged.  Ships systems have failed.  Please hurry, I have 40 crew onboard!
translation: 我想拖住他們，但我需要幫助。  我的引擎損壞了  飛船系統失靈  請快點，我船上有40名船員

english: This is now an urgent humanitarian rescue situation. If we respond quickly enough, we may just be lucky and find a crew we can rescue.
translation: 現在是緊急人道主義救援階段。如果我們反應足夠迅速，也許就能幸運地找到可以營救的船員。

english: You'll need to acquire at least four Manoeuvring thrusters to dock with Captain Ryker's ship.
translation: 您需要獲得至少四個機動推進器才能與雷克艦長的飛船對接。

english: Time is running out.  Send a ship to the Orion Sentinel and provide whatever aid you can, before it's too late.
translation: 時間不多了  在爲時已晚之前，派遣一艘飛船前往獵戶座哨兵號，提供一切可能的援助。

english: Fit four manoeuvering thrusters to your vessel [*X/4]
translation: 爲你的飛船安裝四個操縱推進器 [*X/4]

english: Rescue the crew of the UMC Orion Sentinel [*X/40]
translation: 營救聯電獵戶座哨兵號的船員 [*X/40]

english: Captain, thank goodness you're here! Help us!
translation: 艦長，幸好你來了幫幫我們

english: It looks like they turned and ran when they saw you arrive, Captain.  But my ship is on the brink. The Reactor won't hold out much longer.
translation: 看來他們看到你來了就轉身逃跑了 艦長  但我的飛船岌岌可危反應堆撐不了多久了

english: To rescue my crew you'll need to get close and initiate docking procedures. Use your manoeuvering thrusters to align your docking port with ours, in TACTICAL mode.
translation: 爲了營救我的船員，你們需要靠近並啓動對接程序。在 "戰術 "模式下，使用你的機動推進器將你的對接口與我們的對接口對齊。

english: I'll get the crew ready to evacuate. Please hurry!
translation: 我去讓船員準備撤離請抓緊時間

english: Dock with the UMC Orion Sentinel
translation: 與聯電獵戶座哨兵對接

english: I'll try and buy you a few more seconds, but it's going to go critical any moment.  Get to a safe distance as soon as you can, Captain.  Save my crew!
translation: 我會試着爲你多爭取幾秒鐘 但情況隨時會變得很危急  儘快到達安全距離 艦長  救救我的船員

english: Get to a safe distance before the Orion Sentinel explodes
translation: 在獵戶座哨兵爆炸前到達安全距離

english: In the mean time, take the survivors to the nearest shipyard or colony and drop them off there to close the contract.
translation: 與此同時，把倖存者帶到最近的造船廠或殖民地，在那裏放下他們，結束合同。

english: Drop off the survivors at any shipyard or colony [*X/*Y]
translation: 將倖存者送到任何船廠或殖民地 [*X/*Y]。

english: Regrettably I must inform you Captain Ryker does not appear to be among the survivors.  Her sacrifice will be remembered.
translation: 遺憾的是，我必須告訴你，雷克艦長似乎不在倖存者之列。  她的犧牲將被銘記。

english: We don't know when or where the pirate vessel will strike again. But we must be prepared.  The more we analyse their attacks, the more obvious the pattern becomes.
translation: 我們不知道海盜船何時何地會再次發動襲擊。但我們必須做好準備。  我們對他們的襲擊分析得越多，其模式就越明顯。

english: Help Dr. Martinez rescue his brother.
translation: 幫助馬丁內斯博士救出他的弟弟。

english: Greetings Captain. My name is Dr. Martinez and I'm reaching out to ask for your help.
translation: 你好，艦長。我是馬丁內斯博士，我想請求你的幫助。

english: An accident with our equipment has left my brother in dire need of a rescue, and I need your help.
translation: 我們的設備出了事故，我弟弟急需救援，我需要你們的幫助。

english: The Stargate project funded our research from the beginning.  They buy all the data we can collect, and the closer we travel to the event horizon, the more data our sensors receive. Every mission, we'd push ourselves to go closer.
translation: 星際之門項目從一開始就資助我們的研究  他們購買我們能收集到的所有數據 我們越接近事件穹界 我們的傳感器就能收到越多的數據每次任務，我們都會努力讓自己更接近事件穹界

english: The last time, we pushed it too far.  My brother Marcus took the sensor ship and flew closer than we've ever been before.  Right to the edge.  Closer than anyone has ever been.
translation: 上一次，我們逼得太緊了。  我哥哥馬庫斯開着感應飛船 飛到了我們從未去過的地方  就在邊緣  前所未有的接近

english: I've lost all contact, and he's been down there for a long time now.  He's still showing on the sensors, and his ship is still intact.  The gravitational forces and time dilation will be extreme.  But with your help, we're going to rescue him.
translation: 我失去了所有聯繫 他在下面已經很久了  傳感器上還能看到他 他的飛船也完好無損  引力和時間膨脹會非常大  但在你的幫助下 我們一定能救出他

english: There's only one way to get to him without falling into the black hole ourselves.  We're going to have to do an extremely short range HYPERSPACE HOP.
translation: 只有一個辦法能在不掉進黑洞的情況下找到他。我們必須在極短的距離內進行超空間跳躍。

english: Using a modified FTL Drive you'll do one hyperspace hop toward the black hole, rescue my brother Marcus, then turn around and hop right out.  It will be dangerous, but it's the only way to avoid being dragged in ourselves.
translation: 使用改裝過的超光速驅動器，向黑洞進行一次超空間跳躍，救出我的弟弟馬庫斯，然後掉頭跳出來。雖然這很危險，但這是避免我們自己被拖進去的唯一辦法。

english: You'll then need to use a Loader to start unloading the isotopes into containers.
translation: 然後，您需要使用裝載器開始將同位素卸載到容器中。

english: I'm building the Hyperspace FTL drive that will allow you to perform the hop.  It's going to need some modifications.  I'll need you to manufacture some parts for me. I know you have manufacturing facilities near the Stargate project.  You should be able to make these parts for me without too much trouble.
translation: 我正在製造超空間超光速驅動器，它可以讓你進行跳躍。它需要一些改裝。我需要你幫我製造一些零件。我知道你們在星際之門項目附近有製造工廠。你應該可以爲我製造這些零件，不會太麻煩的。

english: Bring those materials back to me, and we can move onto phase 2.
translation: 把這些材料拿回來給我，我們就可以進入第二階段了。

english: Unload the Hyperspace Isotopes into Containers [*X/*Y]. *Z Containers used
translation: 將超空間同位素卸入集裝箱 [*X/*Y]。 *Z 使用的容器

english: Looks like you have a Hyperspace Scoop!  You can use this to gather the Hyperspace Isotopes I need.
translation: 看來你有一個超空間收集器！  你可以用它來收集我需要的超空間同位素。

english: You'll need to install the Scoop facing forward on the front of your ship, then connect its pipe output to a storage tank.
translation: 您需要將鏟子朝前安裝在飛船前部，然後將其管道輸出端連接到儲油罐。

english: The Scoop works only when you are in hyperspace. So you'll need to gather the isotopes over a few FTL jumps.
translation: 鏟子只有在超空間時才能工作。因此，你需要通過幾次超光速跳躍來收集同位素。

english: You've collected some Hyperspace Isotopes in a tank! You'll need to pump them into Containers so we can easily move them between ships.
translation: 你已經在水箱中收集了一些超空間同位素！你需要把它們泵入容器中，這樣我們就可以很方便地在飛船之間移動它們了。

english: Buy a LOADER from any trade post and install it near your Hyperspace Isotope tanks. Connect the pipes, and set the loader to 'UNLOAD'.
translation: 從任何貿易站購買一臺裝載器，並將其安裝在超空間同位素罐附近。連接管道，並將裝載器設置爲 "卸載"。

english: You should also designate some storage space for the Isotope containers.
translation: 您還應爲同位素容器指定一些存儲空間。

english: You've gathered the materials I need! Bring them back to me at Qz247 to complete the contract.
translation: 你已經收集了我需要的材料把它們帶回 Qz247 交給我，完成合同。

english: It's going to take me some time to prepare the calculations.  Leave things to me and I'll call you when we're ready for the next phase.
translation: 我需要一些時間來準備計算。  把事情交給我吧，等下一階段準備好了，我會打電話給你的。
運送超空間同位素容器 [*X/*Y]
仙女座項目有限責任公司

english: Captain.  My modifications to the FTL Drive are now complete.  We are ready now for phase 2 of my brother's rescue.
translation: 艦長。我對超光速驅動器的改裝已經完成。我們現在可以進行第二階段的營救了。

english: Please come and see me and I'll explain what I need from you.
translation: 請來見我，我會向你解釋我需要你做什麼。

english: I've completed work on the modified FTL drive, using those radioactive hyperspace isotopes you provided.
translation: 我已經利用你提供的放射性超空間同位素，完成了改裝超光速驅動器的工作。

english: With this FTL drive you'll be capable of performing an extremely short range FTL Hop in close proximity to the black hole.  You'll emerge directly on top of my twin brother's ship, and perform the rescue.
translation: 有了這個超光速驅動器，你就能在黑洞附近進行一次極短距離的超光速跳躍。  你會直接出現在我孿生兄弟的飛船頂部，並實施營救。

english: You'll need to make two jumps - one in and one out.  I've checked and double checked the calculations.  I'll need your help to make two FTL charges that work with the modified FTL Hop Drive.
translation: 您需要進行兩次跳躍--一進一出。  我已經反覆檢查過計算結果了。  我需要你幫忙製造兩個超光速充能器，與改裝過的超光速合體驅動器配合使用。

english: I'll need quite a lot of Tilium Crystals for the FTL charges.  Tilium ore can be mined from just about any asteroid belt in the system - but you will need a Mining Laser to do it, and Drones to collect the mineral.
translation: 我需要大量的鈦晶石來充當超光速燃料。  鈦礦石几乎可以從系統中的任何小行星帶開採出來--但你需要一臺激光采礦機和無人機來採集礦石。

english: You'll then need a Smelter to process the ore into Tilium Crystals.  I have most of the equipment you'll need here.  If you dock with my ship I can send it over.
translation: 然後，您需要一個冶煉廠將礦石加工成提裏米晶體。  我這裏有你需要的大部分設備。  如果你停靠我的飛船，我可以把它送過來。
與朱利安-馬丁內斯對接

english: Take those Mining Lasers and the drones and find an asteroid belt with some Tilium deposits.  Point the mining lasers at the Tilium and use the drones to collect the mineral.
translation: 帶上採礦激光器和無人機，找到一個蘊藏着鈦鐵礦的小行星帶。  將採礦激光對準鈦鐵礦，然後使用無人機收集礦石。

english: Once you've mined the resource you'll need to refine it into Tilium Crystals using the Smelter I've provided.
translation: 開採出資源後，您需要使用我提供的熔煉爐將其提煉成 Tilium 晶體。

english: Travel to an asteroid belt with Tilium deposits
translation: 前往一個蘊藏纖雲的小行星帶

english: Return the Tilium Crystals to Dr. Martinez [*X/*Y]
translation: 把 Tilium 晶體還給馬丁內斯博士 [*X/*Y]

english: I know the Stargate Project have been in touch and I know they want their data.  I get that, but let's remember the priority is safely recovering my brother.  Sometimes they take people for granted.
translation: 我知道星際之門計劃一直在聯繫我 我知道他們想要他們的數據  我明白 但我們要記住 首要任務是安全找回我弟弟  有時他們會想當然

english: I'll contact you when I'm ready to begin the rescue.
translation: 當我準備好開始救援時，我會聯繫你的。

english: We heard about your involvement with the Martinez rescue mission and we wanted to offer our support.  The twins have been hugely important to the project from the beginning, and the data they have provided has enabled many of our biggest advancements.
translation: 我們聽說了你們參與馬丁內斯營救任務的事，我們想提供支持。  這對雙胞胎姐妹從一開始就對這個項目非常重要，她們提供的數據使我們取得了許多最大的進展。

english: Their entire operation is funded by us. So I'm sure you believe us when we say that their safe rescue is very important to us - but just as important is the recovery of the data that remains trapped on Marcus' stricken vessel.
translation: 他們的整個行動都是由我們資助的。因此，當我們說他們的安全獲救對我們非常重要時，我相信你們會相信我們，但同樣重要的是，找回馬庫斯遇難船隻上被困的數據。

english: We see no reason why you can't rescue both Marcus and the critical science data at the same time. If you can recover our data during the rescue, we will pay a substantial bonus.
translation: 我們認爲你們沒有理由不同時營救馬庫斯和關鍵科學數據。如果你們能在營救過程中恢復我們的數據，我們將支付一筆可觀的獎金。

english: Think it over.  We'll be in touch.
translation: 請考慮清楚。  我們再聯繫。

english: It's time, Captain. I have everything prepared.  With your help, I can finally rescue my brother.
translation: 是時候了，艦長我已經準備好了一切  有了你的幫助 我終於可以救出我弟弟了

english: You'll be performing the rescue using my ship, using my modified FTL drive that is already installed onboard. You can take control of my ship when you are ready to begin the rescue.
translation: 你們將使用我的飛船進行營救，使用我已經安裝在飛船上的改裝過的超光速驅動器。當你準備好開始營救時，你可以控制我的飛船。

english: Once you take control of my ship, you'll find the location of Marcus' ship programmed into your Sector Map.  You will be jumping directly toward the black hole.  You should expect turbulance.
translation: 一旦你控制了我的飛船，你就會發現馬庫斯飛船的位置已經編入了你的星區地圖。  你將直接跳向黑洞  可能會有亂流

english: You won't have long.  Be as quick as you can and jump out of there when you're done.
translation: 你沒有多少時間了。  動作越快越好，做完就跳出來。
營救馬庫斯-馬丁內斯博士

english: Jump away from the black hole
Losing that data will set the Stargate project back years.
translation: 失去這些數據將使星際之門項目倒退數年。

english: I was beginning to think you wouldn't be coming!  I've been down here for hours!
translation: 我還以爲你不來了呢  我已經在下面等了好幾個小時了

english: Damn it Captain, I don't have time for that!  I don't know how much longer the ship is going to survive like this.  I'll do my best, but you'd better be ready.
translation: 該死的艦長，我沒時間了！  我不知道這艘船還能撐多久  我會盡力而爲，但你最好做好準備

english: What took you so long? I was down there for hours!
translation: 你怎麼去了那麼久？我在下面待了好幾個小時

english: Wait, how long has it been?
You were so close to the event horizon. The temporal distortion was huge.  I've been working on your rescue for a long time Marcus.
translation: 你離事件穹界如此之近時間扭曲是巨大的  我爲營救你已經努力了很久 馬庫斯

english: You've been down there for 10 years.
translation: 你已經在下面呆了10年了。

english: Here's your payment, and a little bonus.
translation: 這是你的報酬，還有一點獎金。

english: It was really close.  I can't believe the risk the Captain made you take for that data.  You could easily have been killed.
translation: 真的很接近了  我真不敢相信艦長讓你冒這麼大的險來獲取數據  你很可能會被殺死

english: Captain, I spent the best part of a decade planning this rescue.  I don't appreciate you risking it all at the crucial moment.  I didn't think you'd take that kind of risk with his life.
translation: 艦長，我花了十年的時間來策劃這次營救  我不欣賞你在關鍵時刻冒這個險  我沒想到你會拿他的生命冒這種險

english: Thank you for your efforts. The contract is closed.
translation: 感謝您的努力。合同已結束。

english: Jesus, Marcus! Get the medical team in here now!
translation: 天啊，馬庫斯快叫醫療隊過來

english: What did you do Captain? Why did it take you so long to bring him on board? For what, for some data?
translation: 艦長，你做了什麼？爲什麼這麼久才帶他上船？爲了什麼？

english: His RAD badge is black.  He's been massively irradiated.  How could you do this to us?  I trusted you with this!
translation: 他的 RAD 徽章是黑色的。  他被大規模輻照過  你怎麼能這樣對我們？  我那麼信任你

english: The data you received is so incomplete that is is rendered virtually useless.  There will be no further bonus from us.
translation: 您收到的數據非常不完整，幾乎毫無用處。  我們不會再提供任何獎金。

english: Our payment has been scaled accordingly with the volume of data received.
translation: 我們的付款已根據收到的數據量相應調整。

english: We're sorry to hear about the condition of Dr. Marcus Martinez.  In all honesty it is a miracle any rescue was even possible, given the circumstances.
translation: 對於馬庫斯-馬丁內斯醫生的病情，我們深表遺憾。  老實說，在當時的情況下，能獲救簡直是個奇蹟。

english: Please accept our payment as a sign of our gratitude. We look forward to continuing to work with you.
translation: 請接受我們的付款，以表謝意。我們期待與您繼續合作。

english: A Wolf in Sheep's Clothing, Part 3
translation: 披着羊皮的狼，第三部分

english: We have hatched a plan that we believe will catch the pirate vessel in the act.  We're standing by with a strike force to bring them to justice, and we need your help to bait the trap.
translation: 我們已經制定了一個計劃，相信能當場抓住這艘海盜船。  我們正準備派遣一支突擊隊將他們繩之以法，我們需要你們的幫助來誘捕他們。

english: This is a risky mission, will you help us?
translation: 這次任務很危險，你願意幫助我們嗎？

english: Captain, we have hatched a plan that we believe will catch the pirate vessel in the act.
translation: 艦長，我們已經制定了一個計劃，相信能在海盜船上抓個現行。

english: Please come to see us and we will explain the mission objectives.
translation: 請來找我們，我們會向您解釋任務目標。
前往指揮官哈肯的飛船

english: Captain, it's time to hold this pirate vessel to account for all the damage they've done, and all the lives they've taken.
translation: 艦長，是時候讓這艘海盜船爲他們造成的損失和奪走的生命負責了。

english: The UMC Astral Temptress is the bait in our trap.  It's a long haul commercial freighter that was due to be scrapped.  We want you to take the Astral Temptress and travel through the most remote, unprotected locations in the sector.
translation: UMC Astral Temptress 是我們陷阱中的誘餌。  這是一艘即將報廢的長途商業貨船。  我們想讓你駕駛星際誘惑者號 穿越這個地區最偏遠、最不受保護的地方

english: Look busy, look like you're going somewhere, and bait them out of hiding.  They won't be able to resist such an easy target.
translation: 看起來很忙，好像要去什麼地方，誘使他們從藏身處出來。  他們不會輕易放過你的。

english: What they won't realise is you'll be carrying several tons of advanced military grade weapon systems, ready to be installed and activated the moment they come in close.
translation: 他們不會意識到的是，你將攜帶數噸重的先進軍用級武器系統，隨時準備在他們靠近時安裝和啓動。

english: We have one final trick, to buy you some time before the cavalry arrives.  We can reverse the energy field in the ship's FTL drive, and trigger a massive burst of EMP energy.  Enough to disable their FTL and prevent any chance of escape.
translation: 我們還有最後一招，在騎兵到來之前給你們爭取時間。我們可以逆轉飛船超光速驅動中的能量場，並引發大規模的電磁脈衝能量。足以癱瘓他們的超光速引擎，並阻止任何逃跑的機會。

english: Your own ship will lose power too - but in the calamity that follows, you'll have time to fit your weapon systems and prepare for a tough fight.
translation: 你自己的飛船也會失去動力--但在隨後的災難中，你有時間安裝武器系統，準備打一場硬仗。

english: You'll have to hold them off for a couple of minutes.  My strike force will perform a combat drop virtually on top of you.  Then the tables will turn in our favour.
translation: 你得拖住他們幾分鐘  我的攻擊部隊會在你們上方進行戰鬥空降  然後形勢就會對我們有利

english: Dock with the Astral Temptress and crew the ship [*X/*Y]
translation: 與 Astral Temptress 號對接併爲其配備船員 [*X/*Y]

english: Jump the Astral Temptress to empty systems until attacked
translation: 將 Astral Temptress 跳轉到空曠的系統中，直到受到攻擊爲止

english: Remember - the pirate vessel will not show themselves unless the Astral Temptress is alone and unarmed. Good hunting!
translation: 記住--除非 Astral Temptress 獨自一人且手無寸鐵，否則海盜船是不會現身的。狩獵愉快

english: The pirates won't take the bait if they see you armed!
translation: 如果海盜看到你有武器，他們就不會上鉤！

english: Uninstall your weapons before jumping again.
translation: 再次跳躍前，請卸載武器。

english: There are other ships in this system. The pirates won't attack you unless they see the cargo ship alone!
translation: 這個系統中還有其他船隻。除非海盜看到只有貨船，否則他們不會攻擊你！

english: Try avoiding busy systems with colonies or shipyards.
translation: 儘量避開有殖民地或造船廠的繁忙系統。

english: We have received intel that this system is too special to risk luring the pirate here.
translation: 我們收到情報說，這個系統太特殊了，不能冒險把海盜引到這裏來。

english: Try to avoid systems with other important activity.
translation: 儘量避免系統與其他重要活動同時進行。

english: This system is exactly the kind where the pirates might attack.
translation: 這個系統正是海盜可能發動襲擊的地方。

english: Keep looking busy and travel to another empty system, the pirates must already be on your trail.
translation: 繼續忙碌，前往另一個空曠的星系，海盜們一定已經在追蹤你了。

english: We almost had them! Your cooperation is crucial for this operation to go smoothly.
translation: 我們差點就抓到他們了！你們的合作對這次行動的順利進行至關重要。

english: The pirates are probably still on your trail thinking you got scared, jump to an empty system to bait them out again.
translation: 海盜們可能還在追蹤你，以爲你被嚇跑了，跳到一個空曠的系統，再次引誘他們出來。

english: We've found them! This is our shot.
translation: 我們找到他們了！這是我們的機會。

english: Charge the EMP weapon and get ready to hit them where it really hurts. Let them come in close. Really close.
translation: 爲電磁脈衝武器充能，準備一擊致命。讓他們靠近真的很近

english: They're in range! Trigger the EMP from your FTL drive now!
translation: 他們進入射程了現在就用超光速引擎觸發電磁脈衝彈

english: Captain, we're on our way.  Mobilise your crew and install those weapon systems ASAP.
translation: 艦長，我們馬上就到  動員你的船員，儘快安裝武器系統。

english: The cavalry are coming.  Hold them off for just a few moments.
translation: 騎兵來了  阻擋他們片刻

english: Install cannons and connect them to the power grid. [*X/*Y]
translation: 安裝大炮並將其連接到電網。[*X/*Y]

english: Survive until the strike force arrives
translation: 在攻擊部隊到達之前存活下來

english: Unfortunately it seems we have arrived too late. Your crew's sacrifice will not be forgotten.
translation: 不幸的是，我們似乎來得太晚了。我們不會忘記你們船員的犧牲。

english: Your skill and bravery have not gone unnoticed. I extend my heartfelt gratitude for your help.
translation: 你們的技能和勇敢沒有被忽視。我對你們的幫助表示衷心的感謝。

english: As a token of appreciation, consider the Astral Temptress now a part of your fleet.
translation: 爲了表示感謝，請將 Astral Temptress 視爲您艦隊的一部分。

english: The ship was due to be scrapped, but we think it may have some years left in its structure yet.
translation: 這艘船本應報廢，但我們認爲它的結構可能還能使用幾年。

english: What is a ship like yours doing all the way out here?
translation: 像你這樣的船跑到這裏來幹什麼？

english: Maybe you can help?  I'm looking for creatures that usually live on small isolated asteroids, like the one in this system.
translation: 也許你能幫忙？  我在尋找通常生活在孤立的小行星上的生物，就像這個星系中的小行星。

english: If you find anything make sure to tell me.
translation: 如果有什麼發現，一定要告訴我。
我的神啊你找到他們了

english: Oh jesus. There's two of them!
Captain, you've made an incredible discovery. We have seen these interstellar lifeforms before, on large asteroids deep in uncharted space. But never alive. And you've found a pair!
translation: 艦長 你有了驚人的發現我們以前在未知太空深處的大小行星上 見過這些星際生命體但從未見過活的而你發現了一對

english: Help Prof. Artemis Toppingbury with his research.
translation: 幫助阿爾忒彌斯-託平伯裏教授開展研究。

english: I should introduce myself. My name is Artemis Toppingbury, and I'm a professor at the Institute of Interstellar Lifeforms.  We've been trying to find a live Tiddlet for years now.
translation: 我應該自我介紹一下我叫阿爾忒彌斯・託平伯裏 我是星際生命體研究所的教授  多年來我們一直在尋找活的提德萊人

english: This is a massive breakthrough. Bring the Tiddlets on board, carefully, using a Logistics Drone. Once you have them, meet me at the Institute for Interstellar Lifeforms.  We're at Starbase S*X.
translation: 這是一個巨大的突破。用貨運無人機小心地把提德萊特帶上來。帶上他們後，到星際生命體研究所找我。我們在星際基地S*X。

english: Install at least one Drone Bay
translation: 安裝至少一個無人機艙

english: Purchase at least one Logistics Drone
translation: 購買至少一架貨運無人機

english: Deliver the Tiddlets to the Institute for Interstellar Lifeforms
translation: 將 Tiddlets 送到星際生命形式研究所

english: You managed to bring them back? Amazing! I'll be here in a second.
translation: 你成功地把它們帶回來了？太神奇了我馬上就來

english: This is the greatest day of my life!
translation: 這是我一生中最美好的一天！

english: To be the first to discover and study an entirely new life form. One native to deep space! Think of all we can learn from these little creatures!
translation: 成爲第一個發現並研究全新生命形式的人。一種原產於深空的生命形式！想想我們能從這些小生物身上學到什麼吧！

english: I mean, you'll get some credit for finding them, of course. But I've waited my whole life for a moment like this.
translation: 我是說，你能找到他們，當然會有一些功勞但我一生都在等待這樣的時刻

english: Now we know where to look, we may be able to find more of them in deep space.
translation: 現在我們知道該去哪裏找了，也許我們能在深空找到更多它們。

english: The asteroid where you found them has a large iron and aluminium core, with some unusual crystalline structures on the outside.
translation: 你發現它們的那顆小行星有一個巨大的鐵鋁核心，外部有一些不尋常的晶體結構。

english: There are similar asteroids within this sector that have been recorded and scanned.  Nobody would bother trying to mine such worthless rocks. They might not have looked too closely.
translation: 這個區域內還有類似的小行星，它們都已被記錄和掃描。  沒有人會費心去開採這些毫無價值的石頭。他們可能沒有仔細觀察。

english: I think it's worth searching there for more of these creatures.
translation: 我認爲值得在那裏尋找更多這種生物。

english: Oh my goodness, I hope they're ok! What's happening??
translation: 天啊，希望他們沒事！發生什麼事了？

english: Oh this is just such incredible news. But what was the condition? Maybe these ones were already fertile and pregnant? Did you see any mating behaviours? I need to do more analysis.
translation: 哦，這真是個令人難以置信的消息。但情況如何呢？也許它們已經有生育能力並懷孕了？你有沒有看到任何交配行爲？我需要做更多的分析。

english: Keep looking Captain. Bring them all back to us when you're done.
translation: 繼續找 船長完成後把它們都帶回來給我們

english: No! Nooooo! Captain what happened? What did you do??
translation: 不！隊長，發生什麼事了？你做了什麼？

english: It looks like they died of shock during the hyperspace jump.  Oh goodness, this is such horrible news.  Did any of them survive?
translation: 看來他們是在超空間跳躍過程中休克而死。  天啊，這真是個可怕的消息  他們有人活下來了嗎？

english: We'll have to be so careful from now on, Captain. I suggest a maximum hyperspace jump range of *X light years while you have these creatures on board. We can't let any more of them perish this way.
translation: 從現在起我們必須小心謹慎，艦長。我建議超空間跳躍的最大範圍是*X 光年 當你帶着這些生物的時候我們不能讓更多的生物這樣喪命。

english: I've been analysing the onboard sensor data while you've been travelling around.  They don't exhibit any sort of physical mating behaviour, but there is a detectable energy exchange going on, and always between groups of three.
translation: 在你們四處旅行的時候，我一直在分析機載傳感器的數據。它們沒有任何交配行爲，但有可探測到的能量交換，而且總是三個一組。

english: They must be reproducing through some form of telepathy, and only in triplets, and only in hyperspace!  No wonder they're such a rare creature.
translation: 它們一定是通過某種心靈感應繁殖的 而且只有三胞胎，還只能在超空間繁殖  難怪它們是如此稀有的生物

english: You'll be getting a call from Dr Swanson very soon.  He funds my lab and all of my research.  I've talked him into directing some of our research grant to you, as a fair reward.
translation: 你很快就會接到斯旺森博士的電話。  我的實驗室和我所有的研究都是他資助的  我已經說服他把我們的一些研究基金給你 作爲公平的回報

english: Captain. On behalf of the Institute for Interstellar Life, thank you. A monumental discovery.
translation: 艦長我代表星際生命研究所感謝你不朽的發現

english: Now let's talk real. Scientists like Artemis like to take all the credit, and bask in the glory of their peers. If your name does show up in their research paper, you can bet it will be on the very last page, in the smallest font available.
translation: 現在，讓我們說點實在的。像阿爾忒彌斯這樣的科學家喜歡獨攬功勞，沉浸在同行的榮耀中。如果你的名字出現在他們的研究論文中，你可以打賭，那一定是在最後一頁，用最小的字體。

english: And despite funding his work for years now, my name will be even lower. It's fine really. We have different aims.  He can have the glory. I'm interested in the breakthroughs. The science that comes from these discoveries. The potential.
translation: 儘管多年來一直在資助他的工作，但我的名字會更低。真的沒關係。我們的目標不同  他可以擁有榮譽我對突破感興趣從這些發現中產生的科學潛力

english: Captain. We're hoping to run some more experiments on the new life form I discovered. The Toppingbury Tiddlet. If you could visit my institute, I have a contract that may be of interest to you.
translation: 艦長我們希望在我發現的新生命體上 再做一些實驗託普平伯裏提德雷如果你能訪問我的研究所 我有一份你可能感興趣的合同

english: Travel to the Institute for Interstellar Lifeforms
translation: 前往星際生命形式研究所

english: The word on the grapevine is that the Nobel prize committee may be looking at our work.
translation: 小道消息說，諾貝爾獎委員會可能會關注我們的工作。

english: Exactly. So we must continue this important research. We have a great deal of data already, but we need to take some more measurements and refine some of our estimates. We are particularly interested in their reproductive process.
translation: 沒錯。因此，我們必須繼續這項重要的研究。我們已經掌握了大量數據，但我們還需要進行更多的測量，並完善我們的一些估計。我們對它們的繁殖過程特別感興趣。

english: We're going to send you a batch of Toppingbury Tiddlets, and we want you to run a series of tests on them under Hyperspace conditions.
translation: 我們會給你寄一批託普平伯裏提德雷，希望你在超空間條件下對它們進行一系列測試。

english: We're also sending you a pair of specially modified science stations, with a sensor attuned to their telepathic reproductive process. I wrote the firmware myself. We will be able to see deep into their minds when this magical process takes place.
translation: 我們還將給你們送去一對經過特殊改裝的科學站，上面裝有一個傳感器，可以感應到它們的心靈感應繁殖過程。我親自編寫了固件當這個神奇的過程發生時 我們就能看到它們的內心深處了
接收 [*X/*Y] 心靈感應傳感器站

english: We need to zero in on exactly how long the Tiddlets can survive in hyperspace. This will regrettably require you to jump beyond the safe distance, and to record the effect on their telepathic process. Some of the Tiddlets may be lost in the process of this experiment.
translation: 我們需要確定蒂德爾特人在超空間裏能存活多久遺憾的是，這需要你跳過安全距離，並記錄下對他們心靈感應過程的影響。在實驗過程中，可能會損失一些提德萊星人。

english: That does make me quite uncomfortable.

translation: 至少擁有*X 超光速燃料

english: Let's start simple. A couple of medium range hops should do the trick.
translation: 讓我們從簡單的開始。幾次中距離跳躍就可以了。

english: Excellent. The sensor is working nicely and we are receiving science packets. Let's do one more medium range hop to gather some more data.
translation: 非常好傳感器工作正常 我們正在接收科學數據包我們再進行一次中距離跳躍，收集更多數據。

english: We'd like to see the effect of a very short hop.  We want to know if there is a minimum hyperspace distance, below which their reproductive process simply does not occur.  Make the jump and let's see how they do.
translation: 我們想看看極短跳躍的效果。  我們想知道是否有一個最小的超空間距離 低於這個距離，它們的繁殖過程就不會發生。  進行跳躍，讓我們看看它們的表現。

english: I'll hand you over to my colleague for the final experiment.
translation: 我把你交給我的同事做最後的實驗。

english: Captain, the Professor has asked me to oversee this phase of the experiment.
translation: 船長，教授讓我監督這一階段的實驗。

english: I need you to make a long range jump. Beyond the safe tiddlet distance.  We need to know what happens to them under the effects of Hyperspace Shock, and this will also help us to calculate that safe distance more accurately.
translation: 我需要你進行遠距離跳躍超過安全距離  我們需要知道它們在超空間震盪的影響下會發生什麼，這也有助於我們更準確地計算安全距離。

english: Get into position and make the long range jump.
Make a jump longer than the Tiddlet safe distance
translation: 跳躍距離超過 Tiddlet 安全距離

english: *X of the Tiddlets appear to have perished.
translation: *X 只提德萊特似乎已經死亡。

english: The sensor data suggests the telepathic mating ritual does begin during the longer jump.  But the telepathic energy induced between them produces so much heat at their core that they ultimately catch fire and burn out from the inside.
translation: 傳感器數據顯示，心靈感應交配儀式確實是在較長的跳躍過程中開始的。  但它們之間的心靈感應能量在它們的核心部位產生了大量的熱量，最終導致它們從內部着火併燒燬。

english: One can only imagine what that must feel like.
Return the Tiddlets to the Institute
translation: 將 Tiddlets 送回研究所

english: Return the bodies to the Institute

We've made another interesting discovery!  Our sensors were correct, and it appears some type of tiny crystal has been formed at the core of several of the dead creatures.  Almost like a small diamond.
translation: 我們又有了一個有趣的發現  我們的感應器是正確的，似乎在幾隻死亡生物的核心部位形成了某種微小的晶體。  就像一顆小鑽石

english: It must have formed in the final moments of their life. All that telepathic energy, focussed into a lethal feedback loop!  Our lab tells us the crystals aren't like anything they've ever seen before.  Let's get the remaining samples in for analysis.
translation: 它一定是在他們生命的最後時刻形成的。所有的心靈感應能量 都集中在一個致命的反饋迴路裏  我們的實驗室告訴我們 這些晶體和他們以前見過的都不一樣  把剩下的樣本拿去分析吧
Tiddlets 的麻煩，第 3 部分

english: Captain, there have been several developments with the Tiddlet Research Program. We are in need of a competent starship pilot once again.  Please visit us at the Institute for Interstellar lifeforms and I can tell you more.
translation: 艦長，提德雷研究計劃有了一些進展。我們再次需要一名合格的星艦駕駛員。  請到星際生命體研究所來，我可以告訴你更多。

english: Travel to the Institute for Interstellar Lifeforms
translation: 前往星際生命形式研究所

english: Assist the Institute with their experiments
Regrettably, Professor Toppingbury has been forced to take a leave of absence.  From the stress of his work, you understand.
translation: 很遺憾 託平伯裏教授被迫請假了  工作壓力太大，你能理解的。

english: We know how they reproduce now, and we know their limits. During hyperspace travel, 3 of them will telepathically reproduce.
translation: 我們現在知道它們是如何繁殖的，也知道它們的極限。在超空間旅行中，它們中的 3 個會通過心靈感應進行繁殖。

english: We're not quite sure yet how long it takes for their children to grow up. However, we've noticed they hop at exactly the same time their parents do.
translation: 我們還不太清楚他們的孩子需要多久才能長大。不過，我們注意到，他們與父母在同一時間蹦蹦跳跳。

english: This isn't important, but I thought you might find it amusing.
translation: 這並不重要，但我覺得你可能會覺得很有趣。

english: As you've already seen, they experience hyperspace shock if they've been in hyperspace travel for too long.
translation: 正如你們已經看到的，如果超空間旅行時間過長，它們就會出現超空間震盪。

english: But the key is in the final stage of their life-cycle.  We know if we expose them to hyperspace shock, their telepathic energies are so strong that a small crystal is formed in their final moments.
translation: 但關鍵在於它們生命週期的最後階段  我們知道如果讓它們受到超空間衝擊 它們的心靈感應能量會非常強大 在它們最後的時刻會形成一個小晶體

english: We've been studying the crystals we've recovered so far.  They resonate in subspace in a way we've never seen before.  Some of the crystals are entangled at the quantum level, and resonate together.  Apply a signal to one and another responds, instantly, across any distance.
translation: 我們一直在研究目前找到的晶體  它們在亞空間產生的共振 是我們從未見過的  有些晶體在量子層面上糾纏在一起 產生了共振  對其中一個施加信號 另一個就會立即響應 無論距離多遠

english: There are so many potential applications.
translation: 潛在的應用領域太多了。

english: So, onto business.  There is a scientist by the name of Dr. Julian Martinez in a nearby system. He had a moment of fame recently after a daring rescue of his brother.  He has a ship for sale that we believe will be of some use.
translation: 說正事吧  在附近的一個星系裏 有一個叫朱利安-馬丁內斯博士的科學家他最近因爲大膽營救自己的弟弟而聲名大噪 He had a moment of fame recently after a daring rescue of his brother.  他有一艘飛船要出售 我們相信會有些用處的

english: Travel to the noble Doctor and buy his ship. He wants a million credits, which is ridiculous.  He thinks his invention is worth that much.  Negotiate with him, knock that price down, and I'll wire the funds directly to him.  If you can improve his offer then I'll pay you 20% of the savings as a bonus.
translation: 前往貴族博士那裏，買下他的飛船。他要一百萬信用點，這太荒唐了。  他覺得他的發明值那麼多錢  和他談判，把價格壓低，我會直接把錢匯給他。  如果你能提高他的出價 我會把節省下來的 20% 作爲獎金給你
購買馬丁內斯博士的飛船

english: Bring the ship to the Institute
Captain! It's so good to hear from you again.  How have you been?
translation: 船長很高興再次聽到你的消息  最近還好嗎？

english: We've been taking some time to recover.  I must admit, I spent so long planning my brother's rescue, I almost don't know what to do with myself.
translation: 我們一直在花時間恢復。  我必須承認，我花了很長時間來計劃營救我弟弟，我幾乎都不知道該拿自己怎麼辦了。

english: Marcus has been in and out of hospital since the rescue.  He has burns all over his body, and took quite a serious dose of radiation.
translation: 自救援以來，馬庫斯一直在醫院裏進進出出。  他全身燒傷，還受到了嚴重的輻射。

english: Of course, you already know that, because it happened while he was uploading your data.
translation: 當然，你已經知道了，因爲這是在他上傳你的數據時發生的。

english: The ship is up for sale.  I can't bear to be on-board any longer.  The price is $1M.  But I suppose you did help to build the hop drive, so I'll let you have it for $800k.
translation: 這艘船正在出售。  我不能再待在船上了。  價格是100萬美元  但我想你確實幫忙建造了跳躍驅動器 所以我可以以80萬美元的價格賣給你

english: Ten years I worked on his rescue.  Ten years.
translation: 十年來，我一直致力於營救他。  十年了

english: Do you know what it's like to die from radiation poisoning?  No?  I do.  Since your rescue attempt I've watched it happen.  Hair falls out, organ failure rips through the body.  Vomiting.  Sick and blood.  For days on end.
translation: 你知道死於輻射中毒是什麼感覺嗎？  不知道嗎？  我知道  自從你的營救行動後 我親眼目睹了這一切  頭髮脫落 身體器官衰竭  嘔吐  噁心 嘔血  一連幾天

english: They wouldn't even let me near him.
translation: 他們甚至不讓我靠近他。

english: You did that to him, Captain.
translation: 是你把他打成這樣的，上尉

english: Very disappointing, Captain.  You'll need to do better if you want to succeed out here.  This ship is costing us an arm and a leg.
translation: 非常令人失望 隊長  如果你想在這裏取得成功 你必須做得更好  這艘船讓我們損失慘重

english: I'll send the funds to Dr. Martinez now.  Bring the ship back to the Institute, and we can begin work.
translation: 我現在就把錢給馬丁內斯博士 I'll send the funds to Dr. Martinez now.  把飛船開回研究所 我們就可以開始工作了
再次聯繫馬丁內斯博士

english: Our plan is simple, Captain.  We found during your excellent field work that the Tiddlets will still reproduce, even with an incredibly short FTL jump.
translation: 我們的計劃很簡單 艦長 Our plan is simple, Captain.  我們在你出色的實地考察中發現 泰德爾特人即使在超光速跳躍時間極短的情況下 依然會繁殖後代

english: The ship you just purchased has a specially modified FTL Hop Drive.  We can use it to make very short jumps and trigger the hyperspace reproductive process among the Tiddlets.
translation: 你剛買的飛船有一個特別改裝的超光速跳躍驅動器  我們可以用它進行極短的跳躍，並觸發提德萊人的超空間繁殖過程。

english: We want you to pair the Hop Drive ship with our Tiddlet Farm vessel, and activate the short range hop drive.  You won't even need to leave the system.  If our calculations are correct, we should see an instant result.
translation: 我們想讓你把 "跳躍驅動 "飛船 和我們的 "提德萊特農場 "飛船配對 然後啓動短程 "跳躍驅動  你甚至不需要離開這個系統。  如果我們的計算正確的話，應該馬上就能看到結果。

english: Fly L*X close to the Tiddlet farm ship
translation: 飛行L*X 靠近 Tiddlet 農場的飛船
進行更多的超空間跳躍 [*X/3]

english: Yes!  I knew this would work!  We can battery farm the tiddlets, in huge quantities, right here in this system!  Keep going.  We need more!
translation: 我就知道這行得通！我們可以在這個系統裏，密集養殖提德萊特，數量巨大！繼續。我們需要更多！
密集養殖 500 只提德萊特

english: It looks like that last jump fried the hop drive.  Not great, given what we paid for it.
translation: 看來最後一跳燒壞了跳轉驅動器。  考慮到我們爲它花的錢，這可不太好。

english: No matter.  I'm certain my engineers can repair it.  In any case, I want the hop drive to be installed on the farm ship directly.
translation: 沒關係  我相信我的工程師可以修好它。  無論如何，我要把跳轉驅動器直接安裝在農場飛船上。

english: This is it, Captain. We stand on the verge of a massive achievement.  Can you imagine how many crystals we can produce, in just one jump?  There could be hundreds.  The research potentials are staggering.
translation: 就是這個，隊長。我們即將取得巨大的成就。你能想象我們一次跳躍能生產多少水晶嗎？可能有幾百顆。研究潛力驚人。
進行遠距離超光速跳躍
